name: Senior QA automation engineer
description:
SERENA Software (www.serena.com), part of MicroFocus group, is the global leader in Application Lifecycle Management for the Enterprise. Based on 30 years of steady growth and innovation, Serena provides solutions that enable Global 2000 IT organizations to manage their projects, coordinate and integrate the software development lifecycle, and synchronize their processes on a global scale. More than 15,000 organizations around the world, including 96 of the Fortune 100, depend on Serena solutions.

At Serena, our engineers continue to learn and grow by working with top professionals from around the world and recent graduates of top universities and by taking advantage of our extensive internal training. Serena has R&D offices in: Silicon Valley, USA; London, UK; Kiev, Ukraine.

 

Responsibilities:

 

  • Install and test Serena Enterprise products.

  • Create automation test scripts.

 

The following skills are MUST (please don't spend your and our time if you don't have the skills below!):

 

  • Testing commercial enterprise level applications: 5+ years.
  • 3 or more years of hands-on QA Automation experience is a must.
  • QA Automation Tools:
  1. TestNG (Junit)
  2. Selenium web driver (understanding of commonly used development patterns)
  • Programming and scripting languages:
    Java (ability to develop automation framework from scratch or understand and maintain existing framework)
  • Continuous integration:
    Jenkins - ability to build from scratch or maintain existing complicated CI processes
  • Dev-Ops:
    Docker - ability to develop and maintain Docker infrastructure. Building custom images from scratch, configure networking for Docker containers, understanding of Docker REST API
  • Advanced knowledge of unix. Ability to administer linux-based environment, hosting Docker, including ability to troubleshoot and resolve all type of issues on heavily used Docker-host environment (networking, file system, etc.)
  • English - Intermediate Level

 

Desirable skills:

 

  • Knowledge of one of the following test automation tools: Ranorex, SilkTest.
  • Familiarity with Yandex HTML Elements library
  • Familiarity with Yandex Allure reporting system
  • Experience in testing REST API, Web Services
  • Experience in programming in C#.

We offer:

 

  • Comfortable working with highly qualified colleagues.

  • Work on interesting and challenging tasks and projects.

  • Opportunity to work in a company that has a strong market position.

  • Contribute to the development of highly competitive products using state-of-the-art technologies and methodologies.

  • Modern office working environment (located in the centre of Kiev) including sports facilities.

  • Flexible working hours.

  • Medical insurance.

 

Please send your CV in English. We guarantee privacy of all the correspondence.

name: Software Developer in Test/Automation QA (C#) for Payoneer
description:
On behalf of the Payoneer, Ciklum is looking for Software Developer in Test/Automation QA (C#) to join Kyiv team on full-time basis. The team develops WEB-Applications. The development includes both client side, mostly using AngualrJS and server side, mostly using C# and SQL. The team shall be working in coordination with the Client's offices in Israel.

 

Payoneer is a fast-growing, profitable, well-funded and dynamic global payments company. Payoneer's offices are located in Israel, New York and more. It is serving thousands of corporates and millions of end-users (payment receivers), in over 200 countries.

Payoneer's R&D organization holds over 100 workers (Developers, Manual QA, Automation QA, DBA, IT, Professional services / production support). R&D teams are operating in SCRUM methodology, with product-manager involved in each team.

Payoneer's systems are based on Microsoft and open-source technology (.NET 4.5, React, Angular, ASP.Net & MVC, CSS/JQuery/JavaScript and AJAX, SQL server 2012/2014, Windows server, IIS) - serving both international WEB users and the Company internal users.

R&D is looking for extending its capacity for new-developments and existing product enhancements, in high quality and fast pace of delivery. R&D is looking for new teams, in Ukraine that will expand capacity, mainly for WEB applications (server side, and the required matching client side). The team will be assigned various tasks of development, changing along the time (not turn-key projects).

With our Payoneer's fast, flexible, secure and low-cost solutions, businesses and professionals in both developed and emerging markets can now pay and get paid globally as easily as they do locally.

 

Responsibilities:

The team will be responsible for the whole development cycle - based on requirements, you will take part of the development and the team shall own also testing until the feature or component is ready for production.

You will learn Payoneer's business, technologies, processes and environments.

Join our R&D to be part of a SCRUM team which develop and maintain WEB-Applications within Payoneer's backbone.

Raise the quality of our product and provide scalability by creating new automation frameworks and tools.

 

Requirements:

  • At least 2 years of experience in .NET, C#
  • Experienced with Selenium
  • Ability to quickly learn new concepts and software
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering and similar or relevant experience as a developer
  • Very good verbal and written communication skills (English)
  • Collaborate with our amazing people; Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers in an agile development environment.

 

Desirable:

  • An advantage - Database usage experience and understanding (preferred - SQL-server)
  • An advantage - Experience with Scrum methodology

 

Personal skills:

  • Responsible and dedicated worker, willing to work in a dynamic and demanding environment
  • Motivated team player who helps drive the team forward
  • Professional, smart and 'get things done' approach
  • Responsible, reliable and accountable personality and great team-player
  • Pro-active attitude and doing what it takes to get the job done
  • A Passion for technology!

 

What's in it for you?

Supportive, friendly and knowledge-sharing social environment. We expect to keep that environment in the offices in Kiev, as well as other values we believe in, like - caring, team play, humbleness and more.

Celebrating diversity as we believe that our people are our greatest resources. We work hard to get things done and never forget to have fun along the way.

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams.

Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

 

Join Ciklum and «Cross the Borders» together with us!

If you are interested - please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

name: Test Analyst
description:
SimCorp Global Professional Services is seeking Service Delivery Consultant with Financial Industry experience and interest in testing of financial software in Client's environment. You will work in our global Validation and Test Management unit which consists of skilled test team working in Kiev and Warsaw with the Project Manager located in Copenhagen. This Team is a client facing part of the SimCorp Global Services organization.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Offer SimCorp consultancy resources for performing and coordinating test when upgrading, patching and changing configuration in existing SimCorp Dimension implementations;
  • Assist client in identifying the client's critical workflows and document these; define test tools and test methodologies that are used internally on a client's side, add knowhow and efficiency to the process;
  • Create business test cases and apply those based on the business requirements defined in the scope document;
  • Analyze the client's SimCorp Dimension workflows (calculation, transaction, interface, reporting and other business flows); match those with scope requirements and defined business cases; create automated test scripts for testing purposes;
  • Automate relevant workflows to increase quality and repeatability.
  • Execute regression test in the Client's environment
  • Prepare test reports for Clients in cooperation HQ Test Management team
  • Participate in analysis workshops for new or existing clients to define optimal test approach
  • Produce and maintain internal documentation (Test Procedures and Guides)

 

Qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Finance, quantitative combination degrees welcomed
  • Strong knowledge of MS Office Applications (Excel) and an interest in IT in general
  • Test experience in Financial Software
  • Experience in Relational Database Management Systems (Access, MS SQL, Oracle or similar)
  • Experience with testing concepts and how high quality test adds value to the client
  • Ability to follow defined test cases and document deviations in an effective manner
  • Ability to work structured and persistent with very large data volumes
  • Ability to work independently as well as in a structured team
  • Consulting experience a plus
  • High analytical capacity
  • Advanced English skills

 

Personal:

  • Interest in the Finance industry and the capacity to get knowledge in new areas
  • Able to locate, analyse and describe a problem in a structured way
  • Able to keep a good grasp of details, accurate with numbers
  • Good at keeping deadlines and work within a tight time schedule
  • Interest in quality assurance (software testing)
  • Initiative team player with analytical mindset and strong communication skills
  • Optimizer by nature, continuously improving
  • Fast learner with high work capacity

 

 

SimCorp offers

... a challenging and rewarding position in a global professional services organisation. The atmosphere is open and informal and highly professional, and you will find great development possibilities, personally as well as professionally.

name: Test Developer for Portfolio Analytics and Reporting
description:
The position

We are looking for the smart, open-minded professional who is passionate about programming and Quality Assurance and willing to apply the skills in practice by building and maintaining automated test suites of the big enterprise system like SimCorp Dimension.

With your skills and interest within autotesting and programming, you excel in finding the bugs in our code before it is released, and you make sure that a good portion of the test cases is automated in test suites that you build, maintain and extend. You will work closely with your developer colleagues in the team to understand requirements, design and implementation.

You will also learn how to work in agile and scrum, and share with us the exciting transformation to Lean-Agile way of working.

You will be working in a global company in the office based in Kiev, together with highly experienced and skilled colleagues, in an open international environment, where your proven skills will be greatly appreciated and respected. Our corporate language is English.

 

Scope of Portfolio Analytics and Reporting:

Portfolio Analytics and Reporting department (ART) is responsible for development and maintenance of diverse calculation and visualizations modules in SimCorp Dimension. We provide SimCorp Dimension users with:

  • Portfolio Analytics that make them understand their risk and reward (Performance and PnL) such that they can excel in servicing their asset owner.
  • Operational KPIs and Benchmarks that enable them to understand the state of their operation and how they can improve it.

Portfolio Analytics and Reporting department consists of around 40 professionals located in Copenhagen and Kiev. Department consists of 4 smaller agile teams (7-9 people) consisting of Product Owner, Scrum Master, Developers and Testers. In our daily work, we use mainly C# and Dyalog APL as programming language.

 

Your tasks will include:

  • Finding errors!
  • Identifying the weak spots in test conditions for the team's solutions
  • Implementing and automating the lightweight test cases for these conditions
  • Building, extending and maintaining test suites
  • Assessing testability of the team's solutions
  • Doing some, but not a lot of manual testing

 

Your qualifications:

Minimum qualifications:

  • Background in computer science, engineering, physics or similar (ongoing or finished)
  • Results oriented and have a positive, open and solution-oriented attitude
  • 2 years of relevant work experience from similar job

name: Software Development Engineer in Test for Janrain
description:
On behalf of Janrain (https://www.janrain.com/ ), Ciklum is looking for Software Development Engineer in Test to join our Kyiv team on full-time basis.

The Software Development Engineer in Test position at Janrain is responsible for the design, development, documentation, testing, and troubleshooting of automated tests for web applications. This is a demanding role that will require hands-on experience with front end, middleware, backend services, Linux system administration, networking, and security. We're looking for an energetic, well-organized, team player to join our Test team as a SDET on Janrain's Kiev based Software Engineering team. Qualified candidates will be passionate about quality / automation / security / scalability / cloud based UX.

 

Have you always dreamed of being a part of a world-class team, but haven't quite found a culture that truly understands what this means? Well, this may be that dream opportunity ready for the taking. Janrain, an Identity Cloud service provider, has built a culture that is a magnet for top talent - a culture where innovation, intellectual honesty, and team camaraderie are more than core values. Janrain created the category it operates in; which positions it to be the largest digital identity network in the world. If you are 'people' who have an insatiable appetite for success with the greater team in mind, you need to talk to us.

 

 

Responsibilities:

  • Write test plans and test cases for assigned features.
  • Develop and own automated test plans for RESTful APIs
  • Partner with the development team to review planned features and identify the most effective approach for automation.
  • Recognize incomplete or missing areas of specifications and work with Product Management to address/remediate them.
  • Review specifications for testability, highlighting and proposing design consideration that will make a feature easier to test via automation, while expanding coverage.
  • Write automated tests using a common test framework and languages (Python, JavaScript)
  • Work on multiple projects and features in tandem.
  • Report total test coverage and automated test coverage in respects to feature/product/code and meet percent coverage goals.
  • Integrate automated tests with current continuous integration systems and add on as necessary, Reporting test results with builds and on demand.
  • Maintain existing automated tests while adding all practical service and hot patch issues in conjunction with simplifying and consolidating tests to keep tests runs as short as possible with the least amount of false failures.
  • Evangelize automation and assist other QA team members through mentorship, tutorials, and writing scripts to speed up their manual testing efforts.

 

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of QA experience in automation design and development using high-level structured programming language, execution and analyzation for key components of a Hybrid automated testing framework
  • Experience with one or more behavior- or test-driven (BDD or TDD) automated testing frameworks and tools
  • Experience in one of the following: Python, Java, Ruby, or C#
  • Knowledge of mobile application solutions for iOS, Android, and Windows
  • Knowledge of other languages/tools, such as C, C++, JavaScript, PHP/Perl, WatiN, Cucumber, JMeter, LoadRunner, UFT/QTP, TestComplete
  • Deep understanding of CI/CD principles and tooling such as Maven, GIT, Jenkins, BitBucket, Bamboo, TFS, VSTS, TeamCity, Perforce
  • Experience with Quality tools like JIRA, HP ALM, VersionOne, Zephyr, Rally, Rational, MTM or TFS/VSTS
  • Experience in writing test plans, creating strategic metric reports, and proactively identifying and mitigating project risks
  • Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education/experience

 

Desirable:

  • Quality Assurance certification is a plus

 

Personal skills:

  • Self-motivated, methodical problem solver, who is detail and quality oriented.

 

What's in it for you?

  • Ability to work on challenging, large project with complex high load identity cloud solutions
  • Opportunity to re-write the project from scratch
  • State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions
  • Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
  • Competitive salary

description:

В большой проект требуются специалисты, которые готовы обучаться и активно использовать все виды тестирования: автоматизированное, мануальное, unit-тестирование и много чего другого.

 

Круг ваших обязанностей будет включать:

  • общение с заказчиками;
  • анализ требований и систем;
  • составление и прохождение чеклистов;
  • тестирование Web-сервисов;
  • разработка и поддержка автоматизированных скриптов для UI/API;
  • анализ результатов;
  • создание баг репортов, для чего вам будет необходимо знание функционала тестируемого продукта и предметной области.

 

Наши требования:

  • обучаемость;
  • знание английского на уровне чтения технической документации и участия в ежедневных scrum-собраниях;
  • понимание методов и технологий разработки и тестирования;
  • базовые знания программирования (Java, Groovy приветствуются) и средств автоматизации (Selenium WebDriver, Geb + Spock);
  • гибкое мышление;
  • умение быстро переключаться между задачами;
  • ответственность и коммуникабельность.

 

Условия работы:

  • готовые программы обучения и ответственные кураторы;
  • технически интересные проекты;
  • отличный коллектив.

 

Что мы предлагаем:

  • отличные возможности и перспективы профессионального роста;
  • достойный уровень вознаграждения;
  • премии за отличные результаты работы;
  • удобный офис в центре Харькова и легендарные корпоративы.

 

Заинтересовались? Тогда заполняйте наше онлайн-резюме уже сегодня!

https://www.nixsolutions.com/ru/cooperation/cv/#tabs-1

name: Senior QA Engineer
description:
DreamTeam is the first Esports and Gaming recruitment and management network that uses blockchain & smart contracts technologies. In our team your are going to provide an all-in-one solution and build a multi-billion dollar economy on one platform.

 

Who we are looking for:

DreamTeam is looking for a QA engineer to join our Web Platform delivery unit. This position will be responsible for QA activities both for core product and client specific projects - manual testing and test cases preparation, cooperation with colleagues within other DreamTeam units. The team is working according to Agile using scrum methodology.

This is a great opportunity for a professional who is looking for a challenge.

 

Required skills:

  • BS is Computer Science or equivalent work experience, MS in Computer Science preferred
  • 3+ experience in manual testing (web-testing, mobile, payments);
  • 1+ experience in agile using Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban);
  • A strong theoretical knowledge base in software testing;
  • Experience with web API testing;
  • Issue tracking and documents tools: Confluence, JIRA, TestRail;
  • Strong troubleshooting skills;
  • Excellent written and oral communication skills;
  • Good command of English.

 

Will be a plus:

  • Automation test writing experience;
  • Basic knowledge in SQL;
  • Jenkins/Git experience is a plus;
  • Knowledge of Web driver \ Selenium is a plus.

 

We offer:

  • Big goals, challenging work, fast learning cycles, practical training, and meaningful feedback;
  • Project exposure and ownership that impacts our world, users, product, colleagues, and business.
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package.

description:

name: Middle QA Engineer (Manual)
description:
Компании IT-Star требуется Middle QA Engineer (Manual)

 

Основные технические пожелания:

  • Опыт работы с web debugging инструментами (например, Fiddler, Charles).

 

Личные качества: ответственность, коммуникабельность, умение работать в команде, желание развиваться.

 

Основные обязанности:

  • Планирование тестирования и составление тестовой документации;
  • Участие в процессе тестирования на всех стадиях разработки;
  • Логирование ошибок;
  • Регрессия исправленных дефектов;
  • Коммуникация со всеми лицами, вовлечёнными в процесс разработки;

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • Работу с интересными проектами в сфере eCommerce;
  • Заработную плату по результатам собеседования c тенденцией к возрастанию в соответствии с результативностью работы;
  • Официальное оформление, оплачиваемый отпуск, 100%-оплачиваемые больничные;

  • Комфортный современный офис в центре (м. Печерская);

  • Неограниченные возможности профессионального роста в соответствии со вкладом и активностью.

 

Если Вас заинтересовала вакансия, пожалуйста, отправляйте свое резюме.

Будем рады видеть в нашей команде!

name: Senior QA Engineer (GPAS)
description:
Playtech is the world's largest online gaming software supplier traded on the London Stock Exchange Main Market, offering cutting-edge, value-added solutions to the industry's leading operators. Company's business portfolio consists of the most prominent names in the business, including William Hill, Netplay, Betfred, Mansion, Bet365, etc.

 

Playtech develops unified software platforms and content for the online and land-based gaming industry, together with providing a range of ancillary services such as marketing, hosting and CRM services.

 

Behind the eminent success of Playtech's products and services there are around 5,000 people with offices and development centers in 14 countries, the majority of whom are engaged in research and development of current and future gaming technologies.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Analysis of system requirements and producing testing specifications from systems requirements

  • Creation of Test Cases, Test Reports
  • Communication with internal development teams regarding requirements clarifications and quality expectations
  • Manual testing of web and mobile applications for various Playtech Open Platform integrations
  • Perform regression testing
  • Estimation of testing efforts for the project
  • Constantly learn from experience and be proactive

 

Requirements:

  • BSC/MS in Software Engineering, Computer or Applied Science
  • Strong experience in software testing and quality assurance (3+ years) of backend systems
  • BSC/MS in either Software Engineering or Computer Science
  • 2-3 years of experience with Client/Server applications
  • Experience working in Linux\Unix and Windows environments
  • Experience in testing micro services with Docker
  • Understanding of JSON and XML data formats
  • Experience in working with websokets and requests simulators
  • Knowledge of Unix shell commands (basic level)
  • Self-motivated proactive personality with positive attitude
  • Good knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures
  • Practical experience in Agile/Scrum development processes (Jira)
  • Good written and spoken English
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, quality geek (detail-orientated)
  • Basic knowledge of networking protocols
  • Passionate about software testing

 

As an advantage:

  • Work experience in gambling/gaming industry
  • Knowledge of online gaming and mobile standards
  • Experience in usage of Test Management tools (Jira, QC, TestLink)
  • Experience with Script writing in Python or Perl
  • Knowledge of Continuous Integration principles and tools
  • Experience as a QA team lead

 

Playtech offers you:

  • Professional growth
  • Educational possibilities
  • Competitive compensation
  • Fully-equipped perfect office space located in the city center ('Palats Sportu' metro station)
  • Warm and friendly attitude to every specialist
  • Possibility to cooperate with a product company

 

We are looking for talented QA engineer that is passionate about software testing and quality and would like to work in paced environment with broad verity of different technologies in a team of bright engineers.

 

If you are creative, 'out of box thinker' and ambitious enough to make a difference in such a large scale International business, you are more than welcome to apply for one of our open positions at Playtech Kyiv. We'll contact you if there's a fit with one of our opportunities.

name: QA Engineer for Formpipe Intelligo
description:
On behalf of Formpipe, Swedish Software Company providing a range of software products and services to the public sector, Ciklum is looking for QA Engineer for the Contentworker Legal development team in Kyiv.

For more than 20 years Formpipe Intelligo delivers document-, knowledge- and email management solutions for the legal market. Today over 400 law firms and corporate legal departments world-wide depend on Formpipe Intelligo solutions for their content management.

 

Contentworker suite for SharePoint provides an essential suite of applications that enhances the SharePoint platform in any document and email intensive environment, which increases SharePoint usability, adoption and ensures compliance. Read more at product sheet.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Working closely with engineering, product, and client service teams
  • Defining, updating, and executing test cases and plans for manual and automated tests
  • Working with other members of cross-functional agile team and product stakeholders to create, implement, and improve QA procedures for our products
  • Performing system integration testing
  • Performing functional and regressions tests on web/desktop/mobile project components
  • Performing load testing and analysis
  • Creating and applying new approaches and concepts to improve the productivity and efficiency of testing practices
  • Finding the bugs that others miss!

 

Requirements:

  • Spoken and written English - starting from intermediate level
  • Comprehensive knowledge of software development life cycle and quality assurance practices
  • Hands-on experience of test design, execution and reporting
  • Being excellent communicator with strong analytical, problem solving and debugging skills.
  • Working experience with SQL queries (MSSQL), JavaScript/HTML/CSS, PowerShell, IIS, REST APIs, System registry
  • Experience with Scrum methodology and tools (Jira, Trello)
  • University degree in Computer Science or equivalent education
  • Having at least 3 years of experience in web/desktop testing

 

What's in it for you?

  • Ability to use cutting edge technologies and approaches
  • Variety of knowledge sharing, training and self-development opportunities
  • Competitive salary
  • State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

 

About Ciklum

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams.

Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

Join Ciklum and 'Cross the Borders' together with us!

If you are interested - please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

name: Senior AQA
description:
Project Overview:

In cooperation with the leading global provider of maps, traffic and places data enabling navigation, location-based services and mobile advertising around the world, Intellias is looking for Senior AQA engineer with strong technical skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Maintain and review existing test cases and test approaches, suggest improvements;
  • Design, write, execute, automate, maintain new automated tests;
  • Test environment setup and configuration;
  • Create, maintain and enhance test documentation;
  • Track quality assurance metrics;
  • Test results analysis, documenting and defects reporting;
  • Integrate automated tests into our continuous integration infrastructure;
  • Research and assess new technologies and test tools;
  • Perform QA activities including report results and quality metrics;
  • Triage found failures and report them to respective teams;
  • Mentor team mates and foster quality culture among them;
  • Driving and coordinating inter-team QA activities.

Requirements:

  • Passion for quality;
  • 3+ years of overall professional experience in Software Engineering;
  • 2+ years of experience in Manual Testing of Software;
  • Experience in Automation Testing of Software and willing to grow further into automation is a plus;
  • Good knowledge of Python or C++;
  • Intermediate or higher written and spoken English;
  • Understanding of Agile methodologies and engineering practices;
  • Experience with Linux (advanced user);
  • Experience with Continuous Integration/Delivery.

Nice to have:

  • Ability to understand Ruby code;
  • Previous experience in testing of navigation systems/in-car infotainment system.

name: Senior Automation Engineer (Python) (IRC59806)
description:
GlobalLogic Ukraine is inviting a Senior Automation Engineer (Python) to join its Kyiv office.

The mission of the Quality Assurance team is to create technology frameworks, implement quality best practices processes, and develop tools to ensure we deliver optimal end user experience for our products. QA facilitates quality and transparency into our software processes and products and helps validate business use cases and functionality with high confidence.

At our project, we encourage out of the box thinking to create an environment that promotes innovative products.

With the stability and support of a large organization and the flexibility of a start up, there is a unique opportunity for individuals to develop solutions from ground up that contributes directly to the success of the company. We have a world class Quality Assurance team with passionate, talented, and driven QA engineers and SDETs that influence the direction of our technology that impacts customers globally.

We offer:

  • Interesting and challenging opportunity in a large and dynamically developing company
  • Exciting projects involving newest technologies
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package, performance bonus program
  • Modern and comfortable office facilities

Requirements

  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.
  • 2+ years of developing and bolstering automated QA systems and associated test strategies.
  • Experience working with business-critical customer facing applications (user interfaces, APIs and back-end services).
  • Excellent communication skills with emphasis on writing detail oriented documents and communications.
  • Strong understanding of object oriented programming concepts.
  • Strong understanding of web UI and services automation testing.
  • Experience with Java, Python, JavaScript and SQL.
  • Strong experience with web application testing tools (prefer open source software such as Selenium WebDriver and JMeter).
  • Strong experience with Linux.
  • Experience with continuous integration tools, such as Jenkins.
  • Deal well with ambiguous/undefined problems; ability to think abstractly.

Preferences

  • Master's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.
  • Experience with the Ad Tech industry.
  • Familiarity with clustered computing, distributed and parallel computing concepts.

Responsibilities

  • Responsible for designing and implementing build and test infrastructure, creating and enforcing good engineering practices, and evaluating product quality for various external and/or internal products
  • Work on problems in a number of areas, including caching optimizations.
  • Build out our automated testing infrastructure to help us build reliable, scalable, high-quality products and services
  • Participate in design and implementation of test infrastructure to support building and moving services into a Continuous Deployment environment
  • Conduct research and create Proof of Concepts on new testing technologies/tools/concepts
  • Design test strategies by analyzing and dissecting complex heavily integrated software systems
  • Work collaboratively with fellow SDETs to create a true end to end automation solutions
  • Develop and contribute to the automated testing efforts for the QA team
  • Design and build scalable, maintainable and flexible automation test framework.
  • Investigate root cause of issues to assist with finding the most comprehensive and robust solutions.
  • Collaborate closely with product, project and development teams to identify and resolve technical, business, and process related issues.

name: Drive test engineer
description:

Jezeli dla Ciebie brzmi to rozsadnie, przedstawmy sie sobie i porozmawiajmy.

name: QA Engineer
description:
With one in four internet users around the globe using VPNs on a daily basis, and new location spoofing methods cropping up on a daily basis, the need for detecting location fraud is compulsory to ensure proper identification. At GeoGuard, our spoofing detection technology has over 1600 checks to mitigate risk from all types of users who attempt to mask their location, regardless of device, providing companies with access to real-time intelligence on users. We hire people who contribute to making this all happen.

 

We are looking for a QA Engineer to join our team.

 

As a QA Engineer with GeoGuard, you will test and report on the quality assurance of our software to ensure applications are functional and provide great user experience for all our customers. You will continually look for opportunities to improve processes and maintaining open communication with all of your team members.

 

The ideal candidate has at least 2 years' experience in QA, with intermediate to advanced understanding of the principles of manual testing. You have proven to have strong technical skills and are comfortable with Android, iOS, MacOS, and Windows. You also have experience with bug tracking systems and experience in systems used in professional software development such as JIRA is an asset.

 

You are able to, and enjoy, working across multiple teams across locations, have good communication and interpersonal skills. You have proven your ability to work under tight timelines in your previous work experience, and are highly organized and detail-oriented.

 

Your key accountabilities and responsibilities will include (but not limited to):

  • Assist QA Project Lead with effort estimates

  • Create and maintain test cases, checklists and test suites based on the product requirements and test plans as requested

  • Perform manual functional and regression testing of GeoGuard products according to test cases and checklists

  • Record defects found and assign priority to defects according to the GeoGuard QA guidance

  • Participate in team meetings and quality assurance walk-throughs according to the GeoGuard PDLC guidance

  • Identify opportunities for improvements and help others to identify opportunity for improvements by providing clear and constructive feedback

  • Liaise with development and product teams to understand product and business processes

 

Your skills & qualifications:

  • Ability to analyze and interpret complex documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards and regulations)

  • Desire to learn QA automation

  • Post-secondary education or training in a relevant field

  • Strong knowledge of theory and best practices of software testing is an asset

  • Understanding of Object-oriented Programming (OPP) is an asset

 

If you have what we are looking for and would love to join our team in Kharkiv, we want to hear from from you! Please send in your cover letter and resume to hr.ukraine@geoguard.com telling us why you're the person for the job. This position can be located in Kharkiv, Ukraine. To learn more about us, visit www.geoguard.com. We sincerely thank all applicants for applying however we will only be contacting successful applicants; if you are a match for our position, we will be in touch.

name: QA Lead
description:
We are looking for Head of QA in Veon

 

What the first 30-60-90 days in the job will look like ?

 

Within 30 days you will:

Familiarize with PIP/ PAP procedure:

Learn current IT architecture

Inspect current testing process and define main points of test automation;

Learn Digital Business Support System (DBSS) implementation project fundamentals and milestones. Start working on the project.

 

Within 60 days you will:

Learn DBSS and its key features;

Meet key subject matter experts and conduct sessions with them in order to define testing strategy, test automation approach and required testing resources

Provide some project artefacts (test architecture design, testing project plan, technical solution for testing process support and automation, test plan and etc.);

 

Within 90-120 days you will:

Run integration and functional testing and UAT of DBSS

Launch and support a product on the market

 

 

The best candidate should have

  • Real proofed experience in building QA system
  • Experince in building QA automatization
  • Knowledge of telecom technologies will be an advantage
  • Upper intermediate English
  • Understanding of business and business requirements

 

Soft skills must have:

Communications skills are needed for: Interaction with many stakeholders around different geographies in functions

Management experience is needed for: Set the tasks for Marketers in OpCos and control the resultes

Problem solving & strategic thinking & Growth mind-set are needed for: Solving multiply problems in different areas, align plans with many people, act in constantly changing unpredictable environment with many assumptions

 

 

Работа в VEON подразумевает соблюдение высокого уровня деловой этики, юридических обязательств, наших ценностей и Кодекса поведения, поддержки политик и процедур Компании.

Наш пионерский дух воплощен в пяти ценностях: «клиенты - наша страсть», «предпринимательский дух», «инновационность», «сотрудничество» и «открытость». Мы стремимся быть открытыми, что требует от нас действовать этично, правдиво и добросовестно.

name: Manual QA Engineer with good English
description:
DevUp Labs is an on-demand software development company with specialization in web, cloud and mobile development.Manual QA engineer is highly in demand and would be properly treated in our friendly team.

 

What will you do?

  • Manual testing of web and mobile applications

  • Reporting and documenting technical issues

  • Execute test cases and analyze results

  • Collaborate with the BA/PM and development team to improve the products.

 

Requirements:

  • 1 + year of proven experience at similar role

  • Upper Intermediate English level (written and spoken)

  • Good knowledge of theory and best practices in software testing

  • Ability to document and troubleshoot errors

  • Good understanding of software development life-cycle

  • Excellent communication skills

 

What is it for you?

  • Career possibilities with growing team

  • Flexible working hours

  • Ability to work in comfortable coworking (near Shuliavska Metro Station)

  • Long-term employment with paid vacation, sick leave, and work from home possibility

  • Accountant support

  • Compensation for working facilities

  • All the legal public holidays are days off

  • Free english lessons

name: Middle Mobile QA for Ciklum New Client
description:
On behalf of Ciklum New Client, we are looking for experienced Mobile QA to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis and to help create awesome games at a company that puts quality at the front.

Our client is a Tel Aviv based game development company. They produced different social games for iOS, Android and Facebook. Have more than 1 million users. Their goal is to develop top quality casual games and connect people, friends and players from all over the world. They have very good positions on the market, high quality, they care about user experience, do a lot of analysis, company has good revenue grows. With More than 1M Daily Active Users and over 60 Million downloads, their main game is a Top 10 most grossing game in over 60 countries, kept its place as a top grossing game in every country it was officially launched.

We follow our belief that reaching success comes from setting high standards and striving to be the best at all we do:

Stunning art

Fun game play

Marketing expertise

Data science

Advanced technology

No compromises on quality

 

Responsibilities:

  • Writing and working with test case documentation.
  • Working with in-house backend and BI systems.
  • Working with in-house and external test tools.
  • Manual exploratory and regression testing.
  • Working in Kyiv based cross functional teams that also include Unity game developers and Backend developers.

 

Requirements:

  • At least 1 year of experience performing mobile QA.
  • At least 1 year of experience writing and working with test case documentation (STD).
  • Details oriented person.
  • Bonus points for familiarity with gaming.

 

What's in it for you?

  • Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
  • A challenging function, with a lot of responsibility in a unique dynamic environment
  • Work with the latest technologies.
  • Work with skilled and professional team mates. Collaborating together to create awesome games served to tens of millions of players.
  • State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions
  • Competitive salary

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

name: Senior QA Engineer
description:
At Intellectsoft, we are passionate about creating a world in which intelligent software improves millions of lives. Established in 2007, our company has evolved into an international award-winning, full-scale software development company with offices in Silicon Valley, New York, London, Oslo and Minsk. We build, maintain and support business critical applications for enterprise clients, including Universal Pictures, Jaguar Motors, Qualcomm, Ernst & Young, Clinique, Bombardier, London Stock Exchange, Harley-Davidson and many more.

Successful candidate will join our team to help one of the largest companies in communications space to develop, maintain and customize geolocation based product. You'll be working with mobile apps on iOS/Android and back-end part in a team based in Kyiv and communicate closely with clients based in California and Singapore.

 

RESPONSIBILITIES

 

  • Create detailed and well-structured test plans and test cases
  • Conduct testing activities according with established SDLC
  • Analyze the requirements and communicate with the customer on clarification
  • Work both independently and in close collaboration with others in the team and across the business
  • Develop and promote best practices in testing and ensure their adoption
  • Keep track of the progress and effectiveness of testing efforts across all teams
  • Enhance an existing testing strategy
  • Report to the managers and to the customer.

 

REQUIREMENTS

  • 3+ years of experience in Quality Assurance
  • Solid manual testing skills
  • Experience with mobile device testing (iOS/Android)
  • Experience with Pubnub or similar tools
  • Understanding of databases
  • Understanding of API basics
  • Ability to learn quickly by working with the support team and more senior team members
  • Ability to understand the system to create detailed and accurate reports
  • Understanding of Scrum/Agile methodology
  • Excellent problem solving skills
  • Team player, self-motivated, good communicator, driven and committed
  • English level: Upper-Intermediate and higher

NICE TO HAVE:

  • basic SQL skills and experience with MySQL
  • experience with MongoDB
  • basic Automation skills
  • experience with web applications

 

BENEFITS

Intellectsoft Team is a group of talented, progressive and passionate people with diverse interests and backgrounds. Our team shares a common vision and promotes a culture of openness, forward-thinking and fun.

We provide benefits and perks to keep our employees happy, help boost creativity and productivity and also make the work atmosphere more inviting and really worth being a part of.

We offer:

  • Good opportunities to work with remarkable teams from all over the world
  • Lighthearted, inspiring and open company culture
  • Opportunities to travel
  • Health Insurance coverage
  • English language courses
  • Fresh fruit and other snacks onsite
  • Fun corporate events :)

name: Middle QA Engineer
description:
Ты по-прежнему видеть не можешь неудобные сайты? Тебя все так же раздражают зависающие приложения? За твоими плечами уже есть опыт решения различных вопросов, и ты точно знаешь, как сделать онлайн-мир добрее?

 

Ты:

  • способен работать в большой и дружной команде;
  • не боишься сложности и объемов различных проектов;
  • хочешь совершенствоваться, профессионально расти и узнавать много нового.

 

Тогда у тебя есть возможность стать частью нашей команды, постоянно обмениваться опытом с коллегами, принимать участие в по-настоящему интересном тестировании разнообразных проектов и многое другое!

 

Требования:

  • 1,5+ года опыта тестирования Web/Desktop/Mobile приложений;
  • понимание работы Client-Server архитектуры;
  • умение самостоятельно выстраивать стратегии тестирования различных проектов, оценивать покрытие и риски;
  • опыт работы с системами баг-трекинга, системами версионирования;
  • знание методов и технологий тестирования, понимание формальных процессов разработки ПО;
  • умение быстро переключаться между задачами;
  • гибкое аналитическое и алгоритмическое мышление, стремление к саморазвитию, настойчивость в поиске решений и достижении целей;
  • высшее образование в IT или смежной области;
  • уровень английского языка Intermediate и выше.

 

Приветствуются:

  • базовые навыки в программировании или написании скриптов;
  • знание языка разметки XML;
  • основы SQL, Git;
  • опыт работы с билд-серверами для обеспечения непрерывной интеграции;
  • работа с анализаторами трафика (Fiddler, WireShark);
  • опыт автоматизации на Java, Python.

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • участие в полном цикле разработки ПО - от оценки скоупа работ до релиза продукта;
  • участие в самых различных проектах - от небольших мобильных приложений до гигантских SaaS моделей;
  • NIXанутые корпоративы и самые душевные праздники в кругу единомышленников;
  • конференции, программы обучения, открытость к самым безумным идеям.

 

Стремишься к профессиональному развитию и готов каждый день прокачивать свои скилы? - Переходи по ссылке и заполняй наше онлайн-резюме.

name: QA Manager
description:
GlobalLogic Ukraine is inviting a QA Manager to join its Kyiv office.

Development/integrate application to insulin pump subsystem using BLE interface

  • Responsible for planning, managing, maintaining, coordinating and executing the testing for complex, multi-tier applications.
  • Responsible for determining and developing the appropriate test strategy and plan for the project and to track and report progress on this plan during the project life cycle.
  • Manages risk and ensures the successful completion of software projects by establishing and executing software quality measures throughout the software development lifecycle.

We offer:

  • Interesting and challenging opportunity in a large and dynamically developing company
  • Exciting projects involving newest technologies
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package, performance bonus program
  • Modern and comfortable office facilities

Description

  • Responsible for planning, managing, maintaining, coordinating and executing the testing for complex, multi-tier applications.
  • Responsible for determining and developing the appropriate test strategy and plan for the project and to track and report progress on this plan during the project life cycle.
  • Manages risk and ensures the successful completion of software projects by establishing and executing software quality measures throughout the software development lifecycle.

Requirements

  • 6+ years overall testing / quality assurance experience.
  • Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience with test automation tools.
  • Understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and experience working in waterfall / iterative SDLC environments.
  • Experience with testing at various levels (unit, functional, integration, system, load and performance testing).
  • Experience with using Jira to track and manage bugs/defects.
  • QA test automation principles understanding.
  • Able to work independently and in a fast-paced environment.
  • Adheres to development standards, software development lifecycle processes.
  • Constantly seeks ways to improve processes for increased quality.
  • Bachelor's degree required from college or University.

Responsibilities

  • Oversee the quality function, which includes unit, functional, integrated, performance, and user acceptance testing.
  • Setting standards and measuring software quality.
  • Mentoring IT members on QA best practices.
  • Champion quality at all levels in the organization.
  • Participate in the development process, from definition to release;
  • Oversee the design, document, develop, execute, and monitor automated and manual testing.
  • Facilitate and coordinate testing with multiple cross-functional project/product teams.
  • Create and deliver quality metrics and KPIs.
  • Partner with development teams to develop and culture of quality.
  • Manage risks - identify, assess, address or propose mitigation/contingency plans.
  • Perform a thorough review of business requirements, user stories, functional flows & specifications and provide feedback.
  • Prepare test plan documents and write test procedures.
  • Implement test plans within current guidelines by analyzing project requirement documents. Review project documentation for all assigned projects to ensure that the project requirements are clearly defined.
  • Hire and develop talented and passionate QA Engineers.
  • Coordinate and manage teams consisting of employees and consultants located both onsite and offsite.
  • Demonstrate ownership and accountability through self-directed task management.
  • Motivated team player, with very strong analytical skills.
  • Good oral communication and writing skills.

name: Спеціаліст з організації обслуговування споживачів
description:
ПАТ «Укртелеком», одна з найбільших телекомунікаційних компаній країни, найбільший оператор фіксованого зв'язку в Україні, лідер серед провайдерів Інтернету відкриває вакансію Спеціаліст з організації обслуговування споживачів.

 

Ми шукаємо кандидата, який:

  • має знання в області бухгалтерії щодо кредитових та дебетових операцій при розрахунках за надані послуги і правильність їх обліку в системах;
  • має досвід роботи щодо розрахунків з клієнтами за надані послуги, досвід розробки технологічних вимог, завдань та навчальних матеріалів для вдосконалення роботи з абонентами, дебіторами;
  • володіє презентаційними та комунікативними навичками, вміє працювати з аудиторією, має грамотну усну і письмову мову.

 

Ми вітаємо і чекаємо від кандидата ініціативи по форматам, видам і темам заходів і активностей, які позитивно вплинуть на ефективність роботи компанії.

 

Основні обов'язки:

  • організація, моніторинг проведення робіт щодо погашення дебіторської заборгованості абонентів-фізичних осіб, надання пропозицій щодо модернізації існуючих процесів;
  • тестування компонентів / процедур систем: CRM, Billing щодо розрахунків з абонентами-фізичними особами за надані телекомунікаційні послуги;
  • організація / контроль реєстрації в білінговій системі телекомунікаційних послуг, наданих абонентам;
  • пошук можливих помилок і збоїв у функціонуванні об'єкта тестування (продукту, програми тощо);
  • формування звітів та аналіз ефективності роботи з боржниками.

 

Наш кандидат отримає новий досвід роботи в CRM та білінгових системах, навички створення, опису та впровадження нових систем, процесів.

 

Ми пропонуємо:

  • навчання на місці роботи (дистанційно) та виїзні тренінги;
  • зручний графік роботи: пн-чт з 8:30 до 17:30, пт з 8:30 до 16:15;
  • оплачувана відпустка: 31 день на рік;
  • офіційне працевлаштування;
  • корпоративний мобільний зв'язок;
  • комфортний офіс у 5 хвилинах від центру, 2х хвилинах від метро, 1 хвилині від парку;
  • активне життя колективу (он-лайн вікторини, флешмоби, участь у зйомках відео, виїзні змагання з футболу/волейболу/настільного тенісу та багато іншого);
  • щоквартальна програма мотивації кращих співробітників компанії. Кращі співробітники року їдуть на відпочинок за кордон.

name: Manual QA Lead for Testing Center of Excellence
description:
On behalf of Testing Center of Excellence, Ciklum is looking for Manual QA Lead to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis. QA Lead primary responsibility is to make sure that Quality Assurance Strategy, Plans, Practices, and Processes allow the two tightly integrated projects in Fintech area with Microsoft technology stack to be delivered successfully.

 

 

Testing Center of Excellence is looking for technology experts who want to make a positive influence on new business by applying best QA practices and taking ownership.

We are a growing business unit of Ciklum with currently 70+ employees, specializing in Software quality assurance. Currently we are dealing with approximately 30 projects simultaneously. Our projects usually last for 6-12 months and our technological focus is mainly on web and mobile technologies. So, you'll have the opportunity to get frequently in touch with new projects, processes, approaches, technologies, and tools. Through direct knowledge exchange with international clients you are an important contributor in making them successful.

Our environment gives you the opportunity to share your professionalism to help team members grow and we support you with training and education in the areas where you want to develop.

 

 

About Testing Center of Excellence:

 

Testing Center of Excellence is software quality assurance unit in Ciklum which has been evolved very rapidly for the past 5 years to a mature SQA services provider, concurrently serving up to 30 projects, consisting of 70+ SQA professionals, delivering 5 main service lines.

 

Our main principles are:

People are over processes and hierarchy.

Flat and open collaboration/communication increases creativity and brings more value to business.

Investing to people and innovations ensures your future.

Reuse and share your experience - Develop best practices, publicize and follow them.

 

Testing Center of Excellence is an optimal environment for your professional involvement and growth.

 

 

Testing Center of Excellence is unique provider of QA Services and QA Consulting in the following areas:

  • Manual Web / Mobile QA Services
  • eCommerce QA Services
  • Automation QA Services
  • Performance QA Services
  • Security QA Services
  • QA Consulting

Testing Center of Excellence Team has the following certificates:

  • QA area - 46 certificates - ISTQB Foundation
  • QA area - 3 certificates - ISTQB Advanced Test Analyst & Test Manager
  • Scrum Master area - 29 certificates - ICAgile Certified Professional
  • Security area - 3 certificate - Offensive Security Certified Professional

QA Awards:

  • Finalist for the European Software Testing Awards (2015, 2016) http://www.ciklum.com/ciklum-shortlisted-for-the-european-software-testing-awards-2015/

https://www.ciklum.com/press-releases/ciklum-named-as-a-finalist-at-the-european-software-testing-awards-2016/

  • European IT & Software Excellence Awards http://www.iteawards.com/content/2016-finalists

 

 

Responsibilities:

 

  • Performing QA Lead team role on 2 closely integrated projects with team of 5-7 people
  • Best QA practice implementation and supervision on all the projects within the program
  • Test Strategy preparation and update on program level (2 projects)
  • Test planning and test estimations (including automation testing)
  • Improving or setting-up QA processes for several different integrated solutions
  • Setup/update QA processes, approaches, frameworks, tools, and team composition from scratch
  • Test design techniques applying
  • QA tasks distribution within the team
  • QA Estimation, Testing Methodology Implementation, Agile QA Process Management
  • Coaching QA team members, QA training

 

 

Requirements:

  • 5+ years professional experience in QA area
  • 3+ years of leading, coaching experience
  • Ability to establish QA processes from scratch with further monitoring and control, including creation and maintenance of supportive artifacts, procedures, and metrics
  • Team leading / management at least 5 people
  • Excellent knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types
  • Knowledge of testing specifics for different application types and business domains
  • Deep understanding of development processes, approaches, infrastructure and tools
  • Strong process-oriented and remote collaboration skills
  • Good knowledge in complex SQL queries (Oracle or MSSQL)
  • Good experience in working with REST APIs (JSON, XML, ODATA) using Postman/SoapUI
  • Number of successfully delivered projects at least 5
  • Strong understanding of Agile/Scrum ceremonies and artifacts
  • Analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Solid upper-intermediate English level
  • Experience in Pre Sales process with clients

 

 

Desirable:

  • Experience with TFS, VSTS systems
  • Experience with GUI Automation (Selenium, Page Object principle, locators strategy)
  • ISTQB, ICAgile, Scrum Alliance and/or other certificates

 

 

Personal qualities:

  • Proactivity and great self-management skills (you are able to drive a process by yourself once the goal is established)
  • Strong communication and problem solving skills
  • Leadership
  • Ability to persuade
  • Good analytical skills
  • Self-motivated and goal-driven
  • Motivated to develop and solve complex tasks
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Will to take challenges and educate others

 

 

What's in it for you?

  • Possibility to propose solutions on a project
  • Friendly team
  • Dynamic and challenging tasks
  • Ability to influence project technologies
  • Team of professionals: learn from colleagues and gain recognition of your skills
  • Low bureaucracy, European management style
  • Continuous self-improvement
  • Trainings
  • QA knowledge sharing meetings

 

 

About Ciklum

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams.

Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

 

Join Ciklum and «Cross the Borders» together with us!

If you are interested - please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

name: Test Engineer
description:

  • Уверенный пользователь Linux.
  • Английский язык на уровне Intermediate.
  • Знание теории тестирования и понимание процесса разработки.

 

Как плюс:

  • Опыт работы с системами виртуализации: Hyper-V, VMWare.
  • Навыки работы с сетевыми настройками и сервисами
  • Продвинутый пользователь Windows Server 2008 - Windows Server 2016 (Настройка домена: AD, DNS, DHCP).
  • Опыт работы с Mac OS.

 

Мы предлагаем:

Изучение новых технологий.

Решение интересных и сложных задач.

Перспективу карьерного роста.

Гибкий рабочий график.

Офис в центре города.

Оплачиваемый отпуск и больничные.

Apriorit - A Priority Choice!

name: QA Engineer
description:
Команда MEV шукає самостійного та талановитого QA Engineer'a, який має бажання розвиватись та щоденно покращувати свої вміння. Якщо ти хочеш та вмієш повністю віддаватись своїй справі, нестримно розвиватись в професійному плані - ми потрібні одне одному.

 

Необхідні навички:

  • Досвід тестування від 1-го року;

  • Вміння оформлювати тестову документацію (test cases, test plans, checklist, bugreports);

  • Знання роботи клієнт-серверних додатків і роботи браузерів;

  • Розуміння процесів QA на всіх етапах розробки програмного забезпечення;

  • Знання життєвого циклу bug'а, розуміння його впливу на систему;

  • Сильні аналітичні навички;

  • Увага до деталей, та бачення продукта зі сторони споживача;

  • Досвід роботи з bug tracking системами;

  • Досвід роботи з UNIX системами;

  • Досвід роботи з SQL та MongoDB;

  • Знання англійської мови (intermediate та вище).

 

Великий плюс, якщо у тебе є досвід у:

  • Тестуванні мобільних додатків;

  • Тестуванні API;

  • Перфоменс (Jmeter) тестуванні;

  • Роботі з Git;

  • Роботі з засобами віртуалізації (vagrant, docker);

  • Навички автоматизованого тестування.

 

У нас ти зможеш:

  • Працювати в команді професіоналів-однодумців, в якій кожен несе відповідальність за результат;

  • Спілкуватися з клієнтом;

  • Ділитися досвідом і переймати досвід у колег;

  • Всебічно розвиватися;

  • Прокачати свої problem solving навички.

 

Пропонуємо:

  • Конкурентну заробітну плату (сума обговорюється на співбесіді);

  • Офіційне працевлаштування;

  • Медичне страхування;

  • Оплачувану відпустку (24 календарні дні);

  • Вигідні умови для relocation;

  • Професійний розвиток (відвідування конференцій за рахунок компанії, курси англійської мови, участь в хакатонах, професійну літературу та багато іншого);

  • Корпоративний відпочинок.

 

Приєднуйся до нас та давай разом робити цей світ та себе самих кращими!

name: Product Quality, Release and Automation Lead
description:
Do you care about developing products that can change people's life for better?

Are you passionate about Microsoft Technology stack?

Do you know what 'hygge' means?:)

 

If your answer is 'yes' to all of the above, then Auditdata is looking for you - talented, proactive and compassionate software engineer to join our international team in Kyiv office.

 

Danish company, Auditdata A/S, for more than 25 years now has been successfully providing state of the art technology solutions within Audiology healthcare domain worldwide. Our software and hardware products help people breaking their hearing loss physiological and psychological barriers to significantly improve their life quality.

 

We are pioneers and #1 choice for hearing care professionals!

 

As a member of Auditdata's development group, you will work across all our software/hardware product teams, in close cooperation with & coached by Danish management. As a leader you will be driving QA & SDLC process automation forward across all development teams and software products in the company:

 

OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE

 

  • Solid technical background & experience
  • Well-founded analytical approach to finding simple solutions for complex problems
  • A strong sense of responsibility and commitment
  • Pro-active situational leadership approach in daily work
  • Excellent communication, planning and task management skills
  • Self-driven, able to work independently and motivated by challenging tasks
  • Experienced in handling and driving enterprise software quality and release
  • Ability to understand business needs, metrics and convert them into solutions
  • Healthy ambitions to grow and develop, eager to learn and broaden your technical knowledge,
  • Able and willing to facilitate team knowledge sharing, learning culture and teamwork
  • Act as the ambassador of the quality, driver for the initiatives and don't take NO for an answer.

 

TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS

 

  • You have solid experience in software testing and preferable system testing involving hardware, QA work, including hands-on desktop automation, working with automated test tools (Coded UI test, performance, load & stress testing), using C# programming
  • Work experience with Visual Studio and Microsoft Test Manager, as well as Microsoft Team Foundation Server or similar, is a must
  • You are familiar with working according to the SCRUM/Agile processes
  • You can demonstrate prior employment in relevant job positions for at least 3-5 years as QA and/or Release Manager, QA Automation Lead etc.
  • Familiarity with the .NET framework, WPF and SQL database will be a plus, as will experience with testing on cloud / Azure solution.
  • You have a degree in Computer Sciences, IT or equivalent, or similar academic qualifications.
  • If you have an ISTQB foundation or advanced level certification we will consider as a plus else must be pass during the employment.
  • You have excellent communication skills
  • Fluent spoken and written English

 

ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES:

 

  • Drive and improve company Test Strategy implementation & optimization forward - overall responsibility for ensuring quality products releases to the market, using best practices and approaches
  • Drive and improve our product development test automation state - increase coverage, establish quality metrics, organize and streamline our automation suites; make them visible and actionable in our build and deployment pipeline.
  • Mentor existing/new QA staff on framework and best practices in automation. Identify skill and/or process gaps and fill them
  • Hands-on implementation of test automation and help QA Team with testing during project peaks
  • Maintain, develop and improve our manual and automated processes & tools within development environment to increase efficiency and productivity through out full development lifecycle
  • Work closely with product managers, product owners, project managers, solution architects, corporate QA and product QA leads to understand the needs and gaps of each product and process for future improvements
  • Be an integral part of the product development leadership group. Be the voice of product quality and process optimization

 

AUDITDATA OFFERS:

 

  • Long-term, secure engagement in the stable product company
  • Danish management style and culture
  • Great company values and ethics
  • Full cycle SW/HW product development according to high business standards
  • Professional development (incl. ISTQB certifications)
  • Educational opportunities (English classes, paid training & courses)
  • Friendly family-like, 'hygge' atmosphere:) with regular social activities & team-buildings
  • Competitive salary package
  • Comprehensive health insurance
  • Annual paid vacation of 24 business days to support healthy work/life balance
  • Modern office facilities in central Kyiv

 

We would love to welcome you on board!

name: Тестувальник ПЗ
description:

  • Добре розуміння в процесах забезпечення якості, методології розробки ПЗ, типах тестування;

  • Розуміння життєвого циклу розробки ПЗ і місця тестування в ньому; ·

name: Middle Automation QA Engineer (Java) for Testing Center of Excellence
description:
On behalf of Testing Center of Excellence, Ciklum is looking for Middle Automation QA Engineer (Java) to join the Kharkiv team on a full-time basis.

 

We are looking for technology experts who want to make a positive influence on new business by applying best QA practices and taking ownership.

 

Testing Center of Excellence is a software quality assurance unit in Ciklum which has been evolved very rapidly for the past 4 years to a mature SQA services provider department, concurrently serving up to 30 projects, consisting of 110+ SQA professionals, working on 5 main directions: Manual, Automation, Performance, Security and QA Consulting.

Currently we are dealing with approximately 30 projects simultaneously. Our projects usually last for 6-12 months and our technological focus is mainly on web and mobile technologies. So, you'll have the opportunity to get frequently in touch with new projects, processes, approaches, technologies, and tools. Through direct knowledge exchange with international clients you are an important contributor in making them successful.

Our environment gives you the opportunity to share your professionalism to help team members grow and we support you with training and education in the areas where you want to develop.

 

Testing Center of Excellence is a unique provider of QA Services and QA Consulting in the following areas:

  • Manual Web / Mobile QA Services
  • eCommerce QA Services
  • Automation QA Services
  • Performance QA Services
  • Security QA Services
  • QA Consulting

 

Testing Center of Excellence Team has the following certificates:

  • QA area - 64 certificates - ISTQB Foundation
  • QA area - 15 certificates - ISTQB Advanced Test Analyst & Test Manager
  • Scrum Master area - 41 certificates - ICAgile Certified Professional
  • Security area - 3 certificate - Offensive Security Certified Professional

 

QA Awards:

Finalist for the European Software Testing Awards (2015, 2016, 2017):

http://www.ciklum.com/ciklum-shortlisted-for-the-european-software-testing-awards-2015/

https://www.ciklum.com/press-releases/ciklum-named-as-a-finalist-at-the-european-software-testing-awards-2016/

https://www.ciklum.com/press-releases/ciklum-is-a-finalist-of-the-european-software-testing-awards-2017/

 

Responsibilities:

  • Participation in development of test automation framework architecture;
  • Automation of regression and other functional testing on Web/Mobile projects;
  • Building and maintaining automated testing frameworks;
  • Integrating automated testing into CI process;
  • Test case adjustments for automated testing needs;
  • Test data and test environment preparations;
  • Making conclusion and reporting about stability of the product under test;
  • Possibility to perform testing activities on several projects, communicate with developers and project managers.

 

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of professional experience in QA Automation of Web/Mobile products via Selenium (WebDriver)/Appium and supportive frameworks;
  • Solid skills in Java and OOP;
  • Experience in creation of automation frameworks from scratch;
  • Experience with implementation of automated testing for project and system;
  • Experience with continuous integration processes and tools (Jenkins, teamcity etc.);
  • Experience of working with version control systems (e.g. GIT, SVN and others);
  • In-depth knowledge of test automation approaches and procedures;
  • Good experience with API level testing;
  • Good knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types;
  • Understanding of Agile/Scrum;
  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer science or relevant;
  • Good English skills - Intermediate and above.

 

Personal skills:

  • Strong attention to details and accuracy. Good analytical skills;
  • Good team player, motivated to develop and solve complex tasks;
  • Strong communication and problem solving skills;
  • Self-motivated, self-disciplined and result-oriented;

 

Desirable:

  • Experience with Mobile automation; Experience with Mobile automation;
  • Knowledge of programming languages, such as Javascript/Python would be a great plus;
  • Experience with Amazon solutions and tools;
  • Some experience with cloud-based automation solutions like Saucelabs, Browserstack;
  • Good Knowledge of SQL.

 

What's in it for you?

  • Very close cooperation with client;
  • Possibility to propose solutions on a project;
  • Dynamic and challenging tasks;
  • Ability to influence project technologies;
  • Team of professionals: learn from colleagues and gain recognition of your skills;
  • Low bureaucracy, European management style;
  • Continuous self-improvement;
  • Trainings;
  • ISTQB/Java 8 Certification preparation;
  • QA knowledge sharing meetings.

 

About Ciklum

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain. As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed. Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

name: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Our company is currently looking for a junior Software Quality Assurance Engineer.

 

Required Experience and Skills:

  • Understanding of Software development process (project lifecycle and the place of testing in it);
  • Strong knowledge of Software testing theory (methodologies, QA processes, standards and practices;
  • Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS;
  • Knowledge of useful testing tools for web applications: Emulators (BlueStacks, appetize.io), browser extensions (Pixel Perfect, Page Ruler), Firebug and others;
  • Responsibility, exactingness, analytical skills, attention to detail;
  • English - pre-intermediate level (reading/writing/speaking).

 

Main responsibilities:

  • Interact with Developers and QA team on test procedures and results;
  • Produce test documentation, including bug reports and design test cases for sanity testing;
  • Document results, identify discrepancies, troubleshoot and report defects and track them to resolution.

 

Will be plus:

  • Experience in writing test documentation;
  • Experience/knowledge in defect report creation/verification with bug-tracking systems;
  • Ability and desire to fast learning and adapting to new technologies.

 

We offer:

  • Full-time remotely work (not freelance, not working part-time);
  • A truly flexible schedule (you can easily combine work with a private life);
  • A well-established online office;
  • Fair wages and bonuses (at actual exchange rates);
  • Benefits package (external trainings, seminars and workshops, corporative events etc.);
  • Excellent opportunities for professional growth and development.

 

Web Design Sun®, established in 2012, provides huge range of different web development solutions.

We are a friendly, well-knit team of devoted and results-oriented professionals. The founders of the company have changed multiple job places themselves before they established the company. Probably, at the dawn of our work we didn't know how to do everything right, but we did know what we shouldn't do. We always work as a single whole and never leave a teammate one on one with a problem. We don't have a comfortable office with cheap coffee and cookies, but we surely have the final goals, we have numerous achievements that we take pride in. What is the most important, our team is like a real big family where everyone supports and encourages each other!

name: Quality Assurance Engineer Team Lead
description:
Description

 

We are looking for a proactive Team Leader with great management skills, who is able to arrange a process. The candidate should have high analytic skills, be a fast learner, autonomous and well organized. He/she will work with other staff to determine, negotiate and agree on in-house procedures, standards, and specifications. He/she will act as a catalyst for change and improvement in performance and quality.

 

Responsibilities:

Quickly get up to speed with the product and the domain (Financial Reporting)

Analyze existing QA procedures and approaches

Propose both short-term and long-term actions plans on what to be done in QA

Identify areas where test automation is appropriate, select tools, build, control and revise the test automation process

Create QA activities and results reports on a regular basis

Coordinate QA actions across several teams

 

Requirements: 5+ years professional experience in QA area 5+ years of leading and/or coaching experience Good knowledge of Scrum/ Kanban Team leading / management 20+ people Experience of work with bug tracking and test management tools Deep knowledge of Excel (in English) Experience with SQL Work experience with MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL Experience in testing client-server architecture applications and service testing Must be familiar with HTTP, XML Experience in QA methodologies, experience in writing test documentation (test plans, test cases, etc.) Strong English skills

 

Desirable skills:

BA experience Experience with automated testing

 

 

Benefits:

Ability to work in successful IT company with international team

Competitive salary depending on the interview results, annual performance-based bonuses

Flexible work schedule

Health insurance

Life insurance

Legal support 24/7

Business trips

English courses including speaking clubs with native speakers

Participation in training programs

Comfortable office near downtown close to an underground station
