AxiomSL is a global leader in Regulatory Reporting, Capital Adequacy, Risk Management, Liquidity, Compliance and Data Management solutions for more than two decades servicing financial institutions worldwide. With offices across the Americas, Europe and Asia Pacific, AxiomSL provides technology solutions and professional services.

name: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Description

 

 

We are looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) engineer to assess software quality through manual and automated testing.

You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches, consistently execute test cases (manual and/or automated) and analyze results in a timely manner, perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills.

Critical thinking and problem solving abilities are a must, as well as skilled execution of test cases and a passion for quality.

 

Responsibilities:

Analysis of functional specs for completeness & testability Strong customer focus and ability to manage client expectations Functional and non-functional testing of software Also performed white box, grey box, cross browser and other tests Analysis of malfunction cause, clear description of bugs Validating API using Fiddler Test documentation preparation and maintenance Review Test Plans and test cases written by team members Coordination between various scrum teams to ensure consistency and accuracy across test plans Participated in daily Scrum meeting to update the daily sprint status Highlighting the potential risks to QA and Tech Leads which might affect the project schedule

 

 

Requirements:

Education: High Technical Education

At least 2 years of working experience in software testing Strong knowledge of testing processes and excellent in defect tracking Advanced knowledge of testing approaches, principles and methodologies Experience and strong skills in manual testing Experience in test design techniques Web technologies and web application knowledge Strong knowledge with DBMS (Microsoft SQL Server)

English (intermediate level and higher)

 

Desirable skills:

Strong in analytical skills Observing, attentiveness to details and focus on tasks completion

 

Benefits:

Ability to work in successful IT company with international team

Participation in challenging projects

Competitive salary

Paid vacation

Health insurance

Life insurance

Legal support 24/7

Business trips

English courses including speaking clubs with native speakers

Participation in training programs

Comfortable office near downtown close to an underground station

AxiomSL is a global leader in Regulatory Reporting, Capital Adequacy, Risk Management, Liquidity, Compliance and Data Management solutions for more than two decades servicing financial institutions worldwide. With offices across the Americas, Europe and Asia Pacific, AxiomSL provides technology solutions and professional services.

name: Senior QA Engineer
description:
Playtech is the world's largest online gaming software supplier traded on the London Stock Exchange Main Market, offering cutting-edge, value added solutions to the industry's leading operators. Company's business portfolio consists of the most prominent names in the business, including William Hill, Netplay, Betfred, Mansion, Bet365, etc.

 

Playtech develops unified software platforms and content for the online and land-based gaming industry, together with providing a range of ancillary services such as marketing, hosting and CRM services.

 

Behind the eminent success of Playtech's products and services there are around 5,000 people with offices and development centers in 14 countries, the majority of whom are engaged in research and development of current and future gaming.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Analysis of system requirements and producing testing specifications from systems requirements
  • Creation of Test Cases, Test Reports
  • Communication with internal development teams regarding requirements clarifications and quality expectations
  • Manual testing of web and mobile applications for various Playtech Open Platform integrations
  • Perform regression testing
  • Estimation of testing efforts for the project
  • Constantly learn from experience and be proactive

 

Requirements:

  • Strong experience in software testing and quality assurance (3+ years)
  • Self-motivated proactive personality with positive attitude
  • Good knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures
  • 3 years of experience with testing Client/Server applications through UI and API
  • Experience working in Linux and Windows environments
  • Familiarity with container based environments
  • Practical experience in Agile/Scrum development processes
  • Good written and spoken English
  • Good database understanding and experience in writing non-SQL queries
  • Understanding of JSON and XML data formats
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, detail-orientated
  • Basic knowledge of networking protocols ( TCP/HTTP/WS )
  • Passionate about quality

 

As an advantage:

  • Work experience in gambling/gaming industry
  • Knowledge of online gaming and mobile standards
  • Experience in usage of Test Management tools (Jira, QC, TestLink)
  • Experience with Script writing in Python or Perl
  • Knowledge of Unix shell commands (basic level)1+ year of experience in test automation
  • BSC/MS in either Software Engineering or Computer Science
  • Understanding of Continuous Integration principles

 

Playtech offers you:

  • Educational possibilities
  • Competitive compensation
  • Fully-equipped perfect office space located in the city center ('Palats Sportu' metro station)
  • Warm and friendly attitude to every specialist
  • Possibility to cooperate with a product company
  • Professional growth

 

If you are creative, 'out of box thinker' and ambitious enough to make a difference in such a large scale International business, you are more than welcome to apply for one of our open positions at Playtech Kyiv. We'll contact you if there's a fit with one of our opportunities.

name: Test Analyst (IBOR)
description:
SimCorp Ukraine is seeking a Test Analyst with experience from testing of commercial software. You will be part of the Investment Book Of Records (IBOR) organization that is responsible for the development and test of components in SimCorp Dimension primarily related to the clearing and settlement of financial instruments. SimCorp Dimension is one of the leading investment management systems in the world and is used by financial institutions and equity funds in all international and financial markets today.

 

The job

As a Test Analyst, you will be a part of Agile Team that is a cross-functional group of individuals who have the ability and authority to define, build and test Solution value - all in a short iteration time box.

You will be involved in release planning and especially add value in the following activities:

  • Defining testable user stories, including acceptance criteria
  • Participating in project and quality risk analyses
  • Estimating testing effort associated with the user stories
  • Defining the necessary test levels
  • Planning the testing for the release

You will be responsible that any given user story progresses sequentially through the Feature acceptance testing:

  • Feature validation testing, which is usually manual and can involve developers, testers, and business stakeholders working collaboratively to determine whether the feature is fit for use
  • Feature verification testing, which is often automated and involves testing against the user story's acceptance criteria

You will be a part of Investment Book Of Records (IBOR) Agile Release Train - set of Scrum teams, where you have colleagues situated in both Kiev and Copenhagen, Denmark. Furthermore, you will be part of a professional development department with 450 employees in Denmark, Germany, Ukraine and England, releasing SimCorp Dimension functionality twice a year.

 

Your qualifications

We expect you to:

  • have a Masters or Ph.D. degree in quantitative disciplines, such as Economical Cybernetics, Mathematics or Finance
  • have excellent analytical skills and logical thinking ability
  • have interest in quality assurance (software testing)
  • have the ability to locate and describe a problem, pay attention to detail
  • have great English communication skills, written as well as spoken, as English is our corporate language
  • have the aspiration to contribute to our continuous aim of professionalising
  • value a constant further development of your qualifications within software testing.

 

SimCorp offers

SimCorp offers an interesting and challenging position in an international, dynamic and professional organisation. You will be working in an organisation that offers great flexibility with regards to planning your own work and great development opportunities professionally and personally. We have a multitude of social activities and an informal way of communicating, taking charge of our tasks with dedication, team-spirit and humour.

 

The position as Test Analyst for financial software is part of the Tester career path. In SimCorp we have more than 30 career paths for our employees to pursue. Each has a set of corresponding competence requirements creating visible career opportunities and linking our competence development directly to our employees' career development.

name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
Master of Code Global - американська компанія з українським серцем та історією, розпочатою ще у 2004 році. Наш основний центр розробки знаходиться у Черкасах. Ми співпрацюємо з інноваційними відділами всесвітньо відомих компаній та брендів: T-Mobile, World Surf League, FitPay, eBags та ін.

Ми орієнтовані допомогти вирішити проблему клієнта технологічно, для цього ми самі обираємо та пропонуємо клієнту стек технологій для проекту. Саме тому ми дуже цінуємо в людях ініціативу, проактивність в комунікаціях та відкритість до нових технологій.

У нас горизонтальна структура: розробники можуть спілкуватись з клієнтом напряму та пропонувати шляхи вирішення задач. Наша особливість - культура та підхід в роботі з клієнтами, тому ми шукаємо людину не на конкретний проект, а в команду в цілому.

У зв'язку зі збільшенням кількості цікавих проектів, ми шукаємо Manual QA Engineer, якому близький наш світогляд. Ми є технологічними патрнерами стартапу, який створює унікальні інструменти, що дозволяють власникам інтернет магазинів на платформі shopify ставати ще прибутковішими. Команда сама має можливість вибирати технології і інструменти у розробці.

Що важливо у кандидаті?

  • Досвід у ручному тестуванні;
  • Розуміння циклів проекту
  • Вміння зрозуміло описати проблему, знайдену у додатку
  • Бути в курсі останніх тенденцій UI та UX веб- та мобільних платформ;
  • Знання різних видів тестування;
  • English - середній;
  • Знання HTML, CSS, MySQL;
  • Обізнаність у сучасних месенджерах;
  • Гарні комунікативні навички, бажання працювати у команді;
  • Відповідальність та увага до деталей;
  • Вміння бачити продукт зі сторони споживача;
  • Бажання саморозвитку.

Буде плюсом:

  • Досвід роботи з e-commerce проектами

Що потрібно буде робити у проекті?

  • Ручне тестування веб/мобільних додатків;
  • Написання тестової документації (Test Plans, Checklists, Traceability matrices)
  • Знаходження багів та складання баг репортів;
  • Аналіз системи та висунення інхенсментів;
  • Робота у команді розробників;
  • Спілкування з клієнтами за потребою.

Приємності в Master of Code Global:

  • Можливість обирати проект та напрям розвитку;
  • Комунікації команди безпосередньо з клієнтом та можливі подорожжі;
  • Комфортний офіс;
  • Постійний обмін досвідом та знаннями;
  • Курси англійської в офісі;
  • Освітні сесії, мітапи та зустрічі з цікавими спікерами;
  • Класні івенти для всієї родини, адже ми поважаємо сімейні цінності!

Наша команда тут: https://www.facebook.com/masters.community/?fref=ts

Тож, ми чекаємо на твоє резюме!

name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
Wikr Group - продуктовая ИТ-Медиа компания. Мы занимаемся созданием и развитием виральных контент проектов во всем мире.

Наша миссия - улучшать жизнь людей с помощью вдохновляющего, положительного и значимого вирального контента.

Что мы делаем?

Мы делаем очень крутую историю на глобальном медиа-рынке, развивая онлайн-медиа на 7 языках мира. Ежемесячная аудитория наших проектов составляет 100+ млн. уникальных посетителей. На собственной видеостудии площадью 680 кв.м мы производим более 1000 видео, которые набирают более 1 млрд. просмотров в месяц.

 

Наша ит команда создает мобильные приложения в области fitness&health.

Мы ищем QA специалиста, который готов вместе с нами создавать яркие, полезные и уникальные проекты.

 

Необходимые навыки

 

  • 2 + коммерческого опыта в роли QA Engineer
  • Опыт в тестировании мобильных приложений на iOS/Android не менее 1 года.
  • Практический опыт регрессионного и функционального тестирования.
  • Знание методологии и подходов тестирования программного обеспечения
  • Понимание работы клиент-серверных приложений: знание основ HTTP, умение пользоваться инструментами для веб дебага (Charles, Postman)
  • Опыт написания тест кейсов и QA документации
  • Умение провести грамотный анализ требований к задаче и продукту

 

Обязанности

 

  • Мануальное тестирование мобильных приложений (IOS, Android)
  • Написание тест кейсов и тестовой документации

name: Senior QA Engineer for Derivco
description:
On behalf of Derivco Company, Ciklum is looking for a Senior QA Engineer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

 

www.derivco.com | www.microgaming.co.uk

We're the dev house that provides Microgaming with their exceptional gaming content. We pride ourselves on being at the forefront of industry innovation. Our highly skilled teams of designers, developers, illustrators and animators love nothing more than working with the latest technology and having fun trying out new ideas.

The software we produce has enabled Microgaming to become one of the most trusted suppliers of online gaming in the world. We don't just create software. We create entertainment experiences.

Derivco Durban, South Africa

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8_uQgB0_hps

Derivco Hong Kong

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0kywWpYy58Q

Our Family Day at Derivco Durban

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2UCbBhI-Vg

 

Who are we?

We are the Quickfire Team, which falls in part under the Derivco umbrella. We are a fast paced, technologically proficient and exceptionally talented group of people. Our multi-award-winning software platform is technologically diverse and offers challenges in many different areas.

 

The Quickfire platform allows operators to access Microgaming and other cutting edge 3rd party content through a simple and rapid integration process across both the Flash and Mobile platforms. We build leading edge value adds to improve the take up of games by players, via a host of back office marketing, communication and player management tools. Once the initial integration has been completed, operators have access to the largest online Progressive Jackpot Network in the industry, monthly new game releases, Microgaming's blockbuster slots including Thunderstruck II and licensed products such as Battlestar GalacticaTM and HitmanTM.

 

What will you do?

The primary purpose of a functional tester is to ensure the software under test meets the specified requirements and to help create the best experience for our end users, using continually improving testing methodologies and working with other teams to deliver the highest quality.

 

  • Participate in Planning and Design sessions
  • Test Plan Creation/Review/Update using Test Techniques and/or Test templates where relevant
  • Test Data preparation
  • Create/Update/Refactor Test Cases/Artifacts to ensure that all necessary scenarios are covered in the designed tests
  • Completion, review and improvement
  • Test execution
  • Prepare software and test environment
  • Detecte & track defects
  • Adhere and optimise standards and processes

 

Whom are we looking for?

 

Bachelor's Degree, Diploma OR Equivalent and 5+ years testing experience with exposure to agile testing environments

 

The ability to work independently and collaboratively with the team. Integrity, adaptability and excellent communication skills. A passion for lifelong learning and exceptional problems solving skills.

A driven person with good time management and great attention to detail, combined with the ability to deal with ambiguity and drive solutions, independently or collaboratively.

 

Ninja Skills, as below:

  • Strong testing technical ability across multiple platforms (SQL, Web, Service and Mobile)
  • Good understanding and use of testing Processes and Techniques, Test Case Design, Test Case Development
  • Embracing change in a dynamic agile environment
  • Strong test analysis, preparation and planning skills
  • The ability to foresee and create improvements to existing testing procedures as needed.
  • Good knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types (Functional Testing, Blackbox Testing, Smoke Testing, Whitebox Testing, MS Test Manager)
  • Good understanding of Security Development Lifecycle
  • Mentoring/Coaching ability

 

Desirable:

  • TDD/BDD
  • Security frameworks e.g. OWASP
  • Automation Experience

 

What's in it for you?

We are always looking for new approaches to take advantage of and are always keen to embrace change! We embrace innovation in everything we do (and hand out some pretty cool prizes for it as well).

We're convinced that we employ some of the smartest people in the business, so if you like being challenged and feel that you could contribute, we look forward to hearing from you!

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

 

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

Join Ciklum and «Cross the Borders» together with us!

If you are interested - please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

name: QA Team Lead (automation, manual)
description:
Обязанности и задачи:

  • Организация и контроль работы QA команды.

  • Организация процесса тестирования программного продукта: определение процессов, процедур и методик тестирования на протяжении всего жизненного цикла продукта.

  • Управление QA командой: структура команды, функционал, подбор, развитие, оценка и т.д.

  • Приемочное тестирование.

  • Проведение нагрузочного тестирования.

 

Для выполнения обязанностей и задач необходимо:

  • Опыт работы в тестировании не менее 3-х лет.

  • Знание современных технологий разработки ПО и тестирования.

  • Опыт в автоматизации тестирования, в регрессионном и нагрузочном тестировании.

  • Опыт разработки автотестов.

  • Умение организовать процесс тестирования 'с нуля'.

  • Базовые знания java, умение читать и понимать код сложных распределенных программных систем.

  • Знание систем багтрекинга.

  • Навыки планирования и отчетности.

  • Умение мотивировать сотрудников, ставить командные задачи и добиваться необходимого результата.

 

Будет преимуществом:

  • Продвинутый пользователь различных операционных систем.

  • Опыт написания скриптов для систем автоматического тестирования как клиентской, так и серверной сторон (Python, Jython, JavaScript, shell scripts, batch files).

  • Знание инструментов планирования.

 

Взамен мы предлагаем:

  • Работу в продуктовой компании, на «живом» проекте с командой профессионалов.
  • Возможность изучать и внедрять передовые технологии и практики.
  • Свободный и демократичный стиль мышления и работы.
  • Конкурентную заработную плату (по итогам собеседования).
  • Интересные и нетривиальные задачи, которые позволят проявить свой профессионализм и креатив.
  • Комфортный график работы.
  • Работу в современном офисе.
  • Возможность расти профессионально и карьерно (курсы, тренинги, конференции, литература и многое другое).
  • Все плюшки большой ІТ-компании.

 

Всех, кто готов к диалогу - Welcome!

name: QA Engineer for Thomas Cook
description:
On behalf of Thomas Cook, Ciklum is looking for a QA Engineer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

 

As a QA Engineer you will be part of new digital technology team involved in designing and building large scale Web applications that scale to millions of customers, billions of pounds in revenue and thousands of requests per millisecond.

Our product team is very strong, and proposes exciting features. Marketing, optimization and analytics teams will work with us making sure we deliver all requested features they need in order to make our website the most amazing travel platform in the world.

 

Client details

Thomas Cook Group plc is one of the world's leading leisure travel groups with sales of ?7.8 billion in the year ended 30 September 2015. Thomas Cook is supported by 21,813 employees and operates from 15 source markets; it is number one or two (by revenue) in all its core markets. Thomas Cook Group plc's shares are listed on the London Stock Exchange (TCG).

The Company's very essence is to deliver inspiring personal journeys as the trusted pioneer in global travel. The core of our strategy is to deliver a high-tech, high-touch approach and being there for their customers wherever, whenever and however they want to connect with Company.

TC Group is building the capability to support personalized customer interaction through micro segmentation, social media integration, and powerful recommendation analytics.

 

Client's website: thomascook.com

Responsibilities:

As a Technical QA Engineer you will be a part of a Scrum team and will be responsible for the whole set of manual and automation activities, as well as for continuous improvement of the product and QA processes.

  • Test Planning;
  • Test Design (Test Rail);
  • Documentation Review;
  • Test Execution;
  • Reporting;
  • Automation on API, GUI levels (Selenium WebDriver, Appium, Node.js, Protractor, Cucumber);
  • Participation in process improvement, adopting new tools and technologies, implementing best practices.

 

Requirements:

  • Experience in testing of web and/or mobile applications (1.5+ years);
  • Profound theoretical background in SQA methodology and process, test types classifications;
  • Experience with cross-browser testing and/or cross-mobile platform testing;
  • Deep knowledge of test design techniques and ability to implement them practically;
  • Knowledge and skills in requirements testing;
  • Experience in creation different kinds of test documentation;
  • Experience in scripted and exploratory test execution;
  • Experience in usage of Test Management tools (e.g. TestRail, Zephyr, TestLink);
  • Experience in usage of defect tracking systems (preferably Jira);
  • Good understanding of Web technologies and concepts (HTML, CSS, JS, XML, JSON, SQL, MongoDB);
  • Experience of technical testing (g. reading logs, putty, Web Developer Toolbar, Fiddler);
  • Basic practical experience in test automation;
  • Eagerness to learn test automation tools and technologies and implement them practically on a constant basis;
  • Upper intermediate spoken and written English;
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum development processes in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

 

Personal skills:

  • Quick learner;
  • Excellent communication both (written & verbal) and interpersonal skills;
  • Attention to details;
  • Ability to deal with ambiguity and drive independently or collaboratively with team on solutions;
  • Positive approach to difficulties and imaginative problem solver;
  • Profound analytical skills;
  • Proactive, results-oriented personality;
  • Ability to work on multiple tasks and prioritize personal workload;
  • Ability to learn fast and a high degree of creativity and initiative.

 

Desirable:

  • Experience with UI and/or API automation testing and desire to develop further in this area;
  • Good knowledge in OOP;
  • Awareness of architecture and design patterns;
  • Experience with Protractor;
  • Experience with Appium/Selendroid and other mobile automation frameworks;
  • BDD approach (Cucumber, JBehave, JDave etc.);
  • Work with VCS (Git, SVN etc.);
  • Understanding of CI (Jenkins, TeamCity etc.);
  • Experience working with e-commerce products;
  • ISEB/ISTQB - Foundation level.

 

What's in it for you?

Our client is a leading international travel company that has shaped the history of travel and now plans to shape the future of online travel.

The client's digital strategy is to continue pushing the boundaries on its products' capabilities, growth and maturity. It plans to accelerate on new technology innovations in the areas of next generation mobile and tablet user experience, 'big data' analytics driven personalization, advanced cloud computing and cutting edge social/search technologies.

Despite being a large international organization, our client's digital team is setup like a small start-up company (without worrying about the next round of funding). Our development teams are small, flexible and they use an agile approach to quickly iterate and test new innovations in the market with our customers. We focus on using the latest open source technologies to innovate and bring together beautiful, cool products and personalized experiences to our customers

Working for our client, you will have the opportunity to solve some of the most difficult problems facing the industry while having a ton of fun. We have a casual office culture with a strong emphasis on innovation, education and empowerment. We expect our teams to do great things and encourage them to be bold, take risks and try new ideas.

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

Ability to communicate in English (at least writing)

 

Will be a plus:

Knowledge in HTTP, Web-Services (SOAP/REST)

Knowledge and experience with mySQL (preferred) or MSSQL databases.

 

We offer:

High salary based on your skill

Fully-equipped kitchen with coffee, tea, cookies and other goods

Flexible shedule if needed (we work 11-19)

2 minutes from metro

XBOX, chess and other relaxing staff

name: Junior QA Engineer
description:
QA SnoopGame - прогрессивная аутсорсинговая компания, предоставляющая полный спектр услуг по тестированию ПО.

Наша команда - это молодые профессионалы, огромные фанаты игрового мира, которые превратили свое хобби в работу! Наш девиз: 'Делай то, что любишь!'

Именно поэтому мы помогаем нашим клиентам выпускать в свет качественный продукт, который нравится пользователям.

Мы знаем, насколько важно своевременно устранять возникающие неполадки в приложении и стараемся как можно быстрее решать все поставленные задачи.

Мы не останавливаемся на достигнутом и растем с каждым днём!

 

Обязанности:

  • тестирование веб и мобильных приложений;
  • написание тестовой документации;
  • регистрация дефектов в багтрекинговой системе;
  • составление отчетов о результатах тестирования.

 

Требования:

  • уверенное знание теории тестирования;
  • английский язык на уровне Intermediate и выше (обязательно);
  • владение ПК и мобильными устройствами на уровне уверенного пользователя;
  • понимание жизненного цикла ПО.

 

Будет плюсом:

  • опыт работы с багтрекинговой системой JIRA;
  • пройденные курсы по тестированию;
  • опыт бета-тестирования приложений.

 

Условия работы:

  • уютный и просторный офис в центре города;
  • 8-часовой рабочий день;
  • гибкий график работы;
  • оплачиваемые отпуск и больничные;
  • корпоративные праздники;
  • бесплатные занятия по английскому языку.

 

Большая просьба! Наличие в резюме фото, а также описания знаний/навыков/компетенций, которые относятся непосредственно к тестированию ПО, значительно увеличат шансы на получение тестового задания и приглашения на собеседование впоследствии!

name: QA Trainee
description:
We invite novice testers to take part in the trainee program of DataArt. The goal of this program is to bring specialists to a level that will allow them to work independently on IT projects. Under the guidance of an experienced supervisor, a trainee will solve problems in real projects. If at the end of the test period a trainee reaches the required professional level, he or she will receive a Junior QA Engineer qualification and will continue to work in DataArt full time.

 

 

Required Skills and Experience:

 

  • Basic knowledge of manual and automated testing (types of tests, methodologies of organizing testing processes).
  • Knowledge and skills of development (OOP, programming languages);
  • Basic knowledge of databases and skills working with at least one of database management systems (one of the following: MSSQL, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.);
  • Good spoken English.

 

DataArt offers:

 

  • Professional Development:
    - Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
    - The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
    - More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
    - Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
    - Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.
  • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;
  • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;
  • Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely;
  • The ability to work in any of our development centers.

name: Middle Performance QA Engineer for Sisense
description:
On behalf of Sisense (http://sisense.com), Ciklum is looking for a talented Middle Performance QA Engineer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

Sisense is an award-winning Business Intelligence and Analytics software that's radically changing the business world today: Sisense is the only BI software that lets non-technical people join, analyze, and visualize large data sets from multiple sources.

Sisense is changing the world of Business Intelligence with revolutionary technology that speeds and simplifies the analysis of large and complex data. That's why Sisense is backed by the same visionary investors who funded LinkedIn, Box, Tesla, and Twitter - Bessemer Venture Partners, DFJ Growth, Battery Ventures, Genesis Partners and Opus Capital, as Sisense recently completely a $50M series D round. For five-straight years, Sisense has grown its revenue by more than 100 percent and added hundreds of new customers in over 50 countries.

Established in 2004, Sisense has an office on Wall Street in New York City, where the sales and marketing team sits, and two offices in Tel Aviv, Israel, where R&D, worldwide sales, and support are located. Hundreds of businesses, from Fortune 500 companies to innovative start-ups, are using Sisense to crunch their data and uncover insights. eBay, ESPN, Sony, NASA, and Motorola are just a few example of the leading companies who have chosen Sisense as their BI tool.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Analyse product requirements with focus on Backend Performance
  • Create performance testing documentation, test cases and test plan
  • Create, execute and maintain test scripts and scenarios
  • Identify potential bottlenecks, and other performance issues, provide detailed reports both on technical and business levels

 

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of experience working as Performance QA
  • Strong basis in Software Testing theory/practice
  • Knowledge of performance testing principles, and tools such as or similar to JMeter, HP LoadRunner, Gatling
  • A good understanding of networking technologies and infrastructure, client-side architecture.
  • Knowledge of performance bottlenecks and end-to-end performance measures (server response time, throughput, latency, etc.);
  • Practical experience in end-to-end system testing
  • Upper-intermediate English communication skills

 

Personal skills:

  • Strong communication and problem solving skills
  • Proactive, self-motivated, and result-oriented mindset
  • Good analytical skills
  • Good team player, able to concentrate and work without direct supervision
  • Strong attention to details and high accuracy

 

Desirable:

  • Knowledge of SQL
  • Knowledge of test management tools, like TestRail
  • Experience with web automation tools, like Selenium.
  • Experience with CI tools, like TeamCity or Jenkins
  • Experience with version control tools, like git.
  • ISTQB, or other certificates.
  • Any scripting language knowledge
  • Working experience with service side monitoring tools (AppDynamics, NewRelic, Graphite etc.);
  • BS+ in computer science or relevant
  • Experience with Linux;

 

What's in it for you?

  • Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
  • Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
  • Competitive salary
  • Career and professional growth
  • Possibility to work in a big and successful company
  • Long-term employment with 20 working-days paid vacation and other social benefits
  • State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere, which creates really good working conditions

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible.

The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

Join Ciklum and «Cross the Borders» together with us!

 

If you are interested - please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

name: Інженер з тестування
description:
Знайомтесь з кар'єрними можливостями компанії на сайті http://career.vodafone.ua/ та на кар'єрній сторінці у Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Vodafone.UA.Careers

name: Middle QA Engineer
description:
Corel team is looking for Middle QA engineer to be involved into our huge and exciting projects.

 

The ideal candidate is:

 

  • Keen on advancing his or her knowledge
  • Highly focused on product quality with an attention to detail
  • Able to work independently and with a team, with minimal direction and supervision
  • Able to manage multiple competing priorities in a fast paced environment

 

Qualifications:

 

  • Minimum 1 year of software testing experience
  • Experience in analyzing the requirements, creation and execution of test cases and reporting of test results
  • Experience with bug tracking systems
  • Experience with the applications on Windows, MacOS platforms
  • Knowledge of testing types: functional and non-functional, usability testing, basic methodologies
  • Understanding the principles of desktop applications
  • Ability to expound the thoughts in written form
  • Intermediate or higher level of written and spoken English

 

 

One of the many reasons people love to work at Corel is our people. We're passionate about what we do and who we do it for. Others are drawn to our creativity and unwavering commitment to excellence. So if you're looking for a great place to work, a place where you can make a real difference, find out if this exciting opportunity is for you.

name: Senior QA automation engineer (Java skills)
description:
Project Description:

Next-generation flexible client-onboarding tool for one of major banks. It features metadata-driven UI and business processes, so bank may change/optimize their onboarding process even without system restart. You will be part of the team responsible for system core. Our Java-based technology stack includes enterprise-grade libraries like Activiti BPM, Drools BRMS, Spring Framework, Hazelcast Data Grid and Vaadin, React. Project stores data in Oracle Database, MongoDB and external custom-built document storage. Some facts about the project: -solution built from scratch and now is live -we have really good responsive product owner -official communication language is English -so can play scrum-like process with 2-week long iterations -we run Java 8 / Kotlin -each team member creates automated tests for features, they works on (including full set of unit, integration and UI tests) -project makes from dev to production with couple of clicks

 

Responsibilities:

  • Optimize/maintain manual end2end regression tests (Core, Config, Reporting components)
  • Run acceptance and exploratory tests (Core, Config, Reporting components)

 

Skills:

  • Strong knowledge of test design
  • Manual testing experience
  • 4+ years - Experience in web services testing (SoapUI, Postman etc)
  • 2+ years - Excellent skills of reading and analyzing logs to identify root cause of a defect
  • Upper-intermediate written and spoken English
  • Knowledge of Java
  • Functional and non-functional testing experience
  • Ability to prioritize test cases based on risk analysis
  • Knowledge of software testing principles and concepts

name: Middle Manual QA Engineer
description:
Необходимые навыки

Required skills:

2+ years of experience in QA

Strong computer background, attention to details

Deep understanding of testing processes, methodologies

Knowledge of bug-tracking systems

Ability to create and update project documentation

Requirements analysis

Ability to investigate and solve problems

Additional skills:

English - Upper Intermediate level and up

Experience with testing games

Будет плюсом

Knowledge of Unity game development platform

Interesting and challenging work for a large and established US company

Stable employment complying with all local tax laws and regulations

Projects involving newest technologies

Professional development opportunities

24 days of paid vacation

Official Ukrainian holidays are non-working days

Обязанности

Work in a QA team to analyze business requirements, create and execute test cases, report and verify bugs' to guarantee the quality of the developed enterprise-level game solutions;

Keep all project QA-related documents/files up-to-date. Ensure that developed QA-related documentation and other artifacts of testing meet the agreed standards/guidelines;

Actively participate in daily project team meetings and brainstorming activities related to the project;

О проекте

Fishing Planet game studio is a group of talented and dedicated people, who created a successful F2P game from scratch. Our work is challenging and hard, but also extremely interesting. Xbox release is coming in the nearest future.

name: Test Engineer (Web)
description:
3Shape A/S is a Danish hi-tech company specializing in the production and development of 3D solutions (3D scanners and 3D software) for industrial and healthcare applications, such as hearing and dental aid production, where we have a global leading position.

Two graduate students founded 3Shape in the year 2000, and today the company's fast-growing team of 1000+ employees in 20 offices worldwide (Denmark, Germany, Poland, Ukraine, USA etc.) is serving customers in over 100 countries.

 

We are looking for an experienced Test Engineer to work in our Kyiv office.

 

 

Areas of responsibility:

  • Manual testing of web applications
  • Writing test documentation (create & improve checklists, test cases, test plans, QA configuration tips)
  • Reporting of bugs and tracking them during the whole life cycle
  • Functional testing
  • GUI, Cross-browser, Usability testing
  • Performance testing
  • Providing feedback to software development teams
  • Reviewing and analyzing documentation

 

 

You should have experience in the following fields:

  • 2+ years' experience in web applications testing
  • Experience with different testing methodologies
  • Understanding of web-application and browser functioning principles
  • Experience with bug tracking systems (JIRA or equivalent)
  • Experience in writing test documentation (Jira, Confluence)
  • Good knowledge and understanding of agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban)

 

 

Will be a plus:

  • Experience with Automation tools such as Selenium Web Driver
  • Programming experience a plus (familiarity with the Microsoft stack, MS SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript).
  • Experience working with CMS (Sitecore/Liferay or equal)

 

 

We offer:

  • Participation in producing market-leading technology products for customers around the world
  • An effective agile development process empowering the software development teams to take design and planning decisions
  • Lots of interesting challenges that will require your technical, analytical and communicative skills
  • Constant professional growth and development
  • Work in a unique professional, friendly and supportive environment
  • Competitive salary level (white)
  • Occasional trips to Western Europe
  • Good working conditions in a comfortable office (not open space!)
  • Convenient office location (near National Technical University 'KPI')
  • Medical insurance
  • English classes
  • Compensation of lunches
  • Annual paid vacation (24 working days) and paid sick leaves
  • Short working day on Fridays (till 17:00 pm) and Friday beer
  • Regular company events
  • Opportunity to become part of the success that 3Shape has created over the past 15 years

 

We will be glad to welcome you in our team!

 

 

For more information, visit our web-site: www.3shape.com or contact our HR department via e-mail recruit-ua@3shape.com or by phone +380 44 206-11-23.

name: Middle Automation QA Engineer (with Java) for Ciklum Testing Center of Excellence
description:
On behalf of Testing Center of Excellence, Ciklum is looking for Middle Automation QA Engineer (with Java) who wants to make a positive influence on new business by applying best QA practices and taking ownership.

 

Testing Center of Excellence is looking for technology experts who want to make a positive influence on new business by applying best QA practices and taking ownership.

 

We are a growing business unit of Ciklum with currently over 100 employees, specializing in Software quality assurance. Currently we are dealing with approximately 59 projects simultaneously. Our projects usually last for 6-12 months and our technological focus is mainly on web and mobile technologies. So, you'll have the opportunity to get frequently in touch with new projects, processes, approaches, technologies, and tools. Through direct knowledge exchange with international clients you are an important contributor in making them successful.

 

Our environment gives you the opportunity to share your professionalism to help team members grow and we support you with training and education in the areas where you want to develop.

  • Building and maintaining automated testing frameworks.
  • Integrating automated testing into CI process.
  • Test case adjustments for automated testing needs.
  • Test data and test environment preparations.
  • Making conclusion and reporting about stability of the product under test.
  • Possibility to perform testing activities on several projects, communicate with developers and project managers

 

Essential skills:

  • 3+ years of professional experience in QA Automation of Web/Mobile products via Selenium (WebDriver)/Appium and supportive frameworks
  • Solid skills in Java and OOP
  • Experience in creation of automation frameworks from scratch
  • Experience with implementation of automated testing for project and system
  • Experience with continuous integration processes and tools (Jenkins, teamcity etc)

  • In-depth knowledge of test automation approaches and procedures
  • Good experience with API level testing
  • Good knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types
  • Understanding of Agile/Scrum
  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer science or relevant
  • Good English skills - Intermediate and above

 

Would be a good plus:

  • Experience with Mobile automation
  • Knowledge of programming languages, such as Javascript/Python would be a great plus
  • Experience with Amazon solutions and tools
  • Some experience with cloud-based automation solutions like Saucelabs, Browserstack
  • Good Knowledge of SQL

 

Personal skills:

  • Good analytical skills
  • Good team player, motivated to develop and solve complex tasks
  • Strong communication and problem solving skills
  • Self-motivated, self-disciplined and result-oriented
  • Strong attention to details and accuracy

 

What's in it for you?

  • Very close cooperation with different clients

  • Dynamic and challenging tasks.
  • Ability to influence project technologies.
  • Team of professionals: learn from colleagues and gain recognition of your skills.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

description:

Основные обязанности:

Мы предлагаем:

  • • Интересную работу над инновационными проектами;
  • • Бесценный опыт в создании OTT продукта для отечественного и международных рынков;
  • • Работу в дружном коллективе энтузиастов своего дела.
  • • Объективная система оценки качества работы
  • • Перспективы быстрого карьерного роста

name: Quality Assurance (QA) specialist
description:
Location

Hostomel, Kyiv region

 

Purpose of the position

The Quality Assurance specialist acts as a part of Corporate Quality Assurance organization within Kuehne + Nagel Contract Logistics functional unit and deals with testing aspects of the corporate IT application suite with main focus on in-house Warehouse Management System which used in over 65 countries across the world.

 

Main duties and responsibilities

  • Acceptance test within Agile model of software development
  • Analyze Functional Requirement Specification document (FRS), prepare and execute testing plans.
  • Detect and report any deviation between the FRS and software.
  • Provide testing results
  • Perform solutions support and troubleshooting, remote and on-site.
  • User consultancy on processes and key solution with main focus on in-house Warehouse Management System.
  • Projects implementation support worldwide (at least 1 year after).

 

Education

University Degree in Computer Science / Technical

 

Professional experience

Minimum one year of experience in customer support organization and 2+ years business analysis experience with WMS /TMS solutions.

 

Major competencies and skills required

  • Strong analytic mind
  • Strong team player.
  • 1+ years of support and/or business analysis experience with ERP solutions;
  • Basic understanding of ERP/MRP/CRM/WMS application design;
  • Understanding of basic principles of the software development process and QA step, its role and related techniques and processes;
  • SQL knowledge;
  • English intermediate (real) or higher;
  • Result orientation;
  • Ability to work under pressure;

The following competencies will be considered as a plus:

  • One off popular programing languages
  • Logistics and Supply Chain experience.
  • Knowledge of warehouse processes.

 

We offer

  • Good & strong team
  • Competitive market salary;
  • Official employment according to Ukrainian legislation (26 days vacation yearly, paid sick leave, 'white' salary);
  • Annual bonus (based on company's overall performance);
  • Additional personal performance quarter based bonus;
  • Business trips abroad (project implementation support);
  • Medical insurance;
  • Various trainings and career opportunities within an international organization.

name: Тестировщик
description:
RiverSoft - это украинская продуктовая IT-компания. Нас уже более ста человек, и мы объединены идеей создания новых решений, способных упростить многие жизненные процессы. Специализируемся в таких направлениях как мобильная разработка, веб-разработка, десктопные приложения. Также разрабатываем сложные автоматизированные системы и конечно тестируем наше программное обеспечение для достижения гарантии качества.

На данный момент мы в поиске пытливого тестировщика который поможет нам в борьбе с вездесущими багами.

 

Требования:

  • Понимание принципов разработки ПО и процесса тестирования;
  • Знание принципов создания чек-листов, тест-кейсов;
  • Понимание принципов выявление несоответствий ПО;
  • Умение анализировать и структурировать информацию;
  • Знание операционных систем семейства Linux;
  • Ответственный и ориентированный на результат человек.

Обязанности:

  • Контроль качества программного обеспечения, ручное тестирование;
  • Анализ технической документации и разработка тестовой документации на основании требований системы;
  • Разработка test cases, check lists, test plans;
  • Выполнение функционального, регрессионного, нагрузочного и стрессового тестирования программного обеспечения;
  • Обнаружение и документирование багов в баг-трекинге, и мониторинг их исправления.

Присоединившись к нам ты:

  • Станешь частью дружного коллектива;
  • Получишь возможность и содействие своему профессиональному и карьерному росту;
  • Будешь работать в комфортном офисе со всеми удобствами и зонами отдыха;- Получишь доступ к неисчерпаемым запасам чая и кофе, а так же ко вкусным комплексным обедам;
  • Сможешь посещать бесплатные курсы английского языка;
  • Получишь возможность ходить в тренажерный зал или на йогу не покидая стен офиса;
  • Сможешь участвовать во всевозможных корпоративных мероприятиях.

 

Быть частью команды RiverSoft - это участие в полном цикле разработки и реализации идей, более того, это возможность стать частью больших творений. Наши двери всегда открыты для талантливых и вдохновенных профессионалов в поисках возможности проявить себя.

Желаешь стать частью команды RiverSoft, тогда отправляй нам свое резюме!

name: Junior QA Engineer
description:

The ideal candidate is:

 

  • Keen on advancing his or her knowledge

  • Able to work independently and with a team, with minimal direction and supervision

  • Perform testing on huge project and communicate with developers and project managers

  • Knowledge of testing types: functional and non-functional, usability testing, basic methodologies

Nice to have:

 

  • Experience with bug tracking systems
  • Experience with the applications on Windows, MacOS platforms
  • Understanding the principles of desktop applications
  • Ability to expound the thoughts in written form

 

 

One of the many reasons people love to work at Corel is our people. We're passionate about what we do and who we do it for. Others are drawn to our creativity and unwavering commitment to excellence. So if you're looking for a great place to work, a place where you can make a real difference, find out if this exciting opportunity is for you.

name: Lead Software Test Automation Engineer (.Net)
description:
EPAM Systems, Inc., delivers product development and platform engineering services to Global 2000 companies by solving complex business challenges with breakthrough technical innovations.

 

EPAM specializes in digital transformation, business intelligence, big data and analytics, testing, next-gen architecture, digital engagement, service design and business consulting; all supported by over 23 years of software engineering expertise.

 

We are among the fastest growing technology firms globally, with over 200 clients and offices in over 25 countries. We have successfully helped our clients achieve measurable business results through best-in-class software engineering, combined with innovative strategy, consulting and design capabilities.

 

DESCRIPTION

Our client is a leading provider of consumer, financial and property information, analytics and services to business and government. As the leading global property information, analytics and data-enabled solutions provider, its vision is to deliver unique property-level insights that power the global real estate economy.

 

RESPONSIBILITIES

· Develop and execute test plans and test cases with a strong emphasis on using code to solve technical challenges and shorten the test cycle through automation

 

· Estimate test efforts, analyze and communicate test results and participate in day to day QA Activities

 

· Improve the test frameworks, tools and technologies used by the organization to maintain a high quality bar. This can also include writing specialized testing tools for our software platform

 

· Work with Development, Test and Product Stakeholders to design and implement test and validation strategies

 

· Execute and manage test cases and results; report on test and defect metrics

 

· Create, execute and troubleshoot automated test scenarios across our systems

 

· Contribute to robust, scalable, and high quality test automation solutions for functional, regression and performance testing

 

· Contribute to the building of a Continuous Integration (CI) environment and ongoing process improvement activities

 

· Identify required improvements in the test and development processes; make contributions to our automation tools that address specific needs

 

· Maintain a high quality bar in a complex and constantly evolving workspace

 

· Communicate and report to the Test Director on Customer side

 

 

REQUIREMENTS

 

· 3+ Experience in Automation testing in .Net

 

· Strong customer focus, excellent problem solving and analytical skills

 

· Good knowledge of object oriented programming, along with requisite coding and debugging skills

 

· Design and development skills in .Net

 

· Understanding of software design principles, patterns, algorithms, data structures and multi-threading concepts

 

· Proven ability to translate functional requirements and use cases into working test plans and test cases

 

· Knowledge of continuous integration practices

 

· Experience working in an agile environment preferred

 

· Passion for improving code quality through interaction with development team

 

· Demonstrated skill in using coding standards and being an active participant in code reviews

 

· Excellent verbal and written communication skills

 

· English B2 or higher

 

WE OFFER

 

· Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills

 

· Individual career path in engineering

 

· Social package -medical insurance, sports

 

· Compensation for sick lists and regular vacations

 

· Partial grant of the cost of certification and IT conferences

 

· English classes with certified English teachers

name: QA Engineer(Game Studio)
description:
Skywind Group is a privately held entertainment technology solutions provider.

Since our establishment in 2012, we have been growing steadily alongside our partners and customers, proud to witness their own headway augmented by our products.

We shape the future of our industry with world-class games, back-office and content management systems, hosting solutions, infrastructure, proprietary deep learning engine as well as a revolutionary user retention suite of products.

Join us today and be a part of our rapidly growing team of more than 500 professionals spanning 6 development centers across Ukraine, Belarus, Cyprus, the Philippines, Australia, and Bulgaria.

  • Experience in web and mobile applications testing
  • Analytic skills
  • Good English (both oral and written)
  • Good knowledge of web (HTML, JavaScript)
  • Solid understanding of testing principles and products delivery to market
  • Experience in writing and executing test cases
  • Good communication skills
  • An ability to learn quickly and adapt as technology changes
  • Experience in automated Tests will be a plus
  • Experience in slot games will be a plus
  • Knowledge of UNIX-based operating systems is an asset
  • Knowledge of RDBMS
  • Knowledge of Windows-based applications is highly desirable

 

We offer:

  • Possibility to work with a product company
  • Career and professional growth
  • Competitive remuneration
  • Fully-equipped perfect office space located in the city center ('Palats Sportu' metro station)
  • Warm and friendly attitude to every specialist

name: Test engineer / QA engineer
description:
Компания Fulcrum Software занимается разработкой и тестированием программного обеспечения в сфере медицины для одной из крупнейших корпораций мира. В связи с плановым расширением долгосрочного проекта у нас открылись новые вакансии для инженеров по тестированию.

Информация о проекте:

Современное медицинское приложение для УЗИ- диагностики (Windows desktop). Продукт занимает лидирующие позиции на мировом рынке медицинского ПО и ежедневно используется тысячами врачей в большинстве стран мира, включая Украину.

Ваша работа будет в себя включать:

  • Ручное и автоматизированное тестирование медицинского приложения.
  • Тесное сотрудничество с командой разработчиков на проекте.
  • Ежедневное прямое общение с англоязычными коллегами на стороне заказчика.

Основные пожелания к кандидату:

  • Английский - не ниже уровня Upper Intermediate. Часть собеседования будет обязательно проходить на английском языке.
  • Опыт работы в ручном тестировании - от 6 мес.
  • Уверенное понимание принципов верификации ПО.
  • Знание операционной системы Windows на уровне опытного пользователя.
  • Высшее техническое образование.
  • Желательно знание SQL и наличие навыков программирования/ автоматизации.

Компания предлагает конкурентную оплату, интересные задачи и профессиональный рост, гибкий график работы (без овертаймов!), 20 рабочих дней оплачиваемого отпуска, 100% оплачиваемые больничные, возможность командировок в Германию.

Наша работа действительно имеет значение для людей. Присоединяйтесь!

name: Middle QA Engineer
description:
Infopulse welcomes talented professionals to join our challenging and dynamic project as a Strong Middle QA Engineer in our office. Our customer is the big international telecom company, with HQ in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Test Analyst within financial domain
description:
SimCorp Ukraine is seeking a Test Analyst with interest in testing of commercial software. SimCorp Dimension is one of the world's leading investment management systems used by financial institutions and equity funds in all international financial markets today.

 

The job

The role as Test Analyst in an agile team requires excellent analytical skills, logical thinking ability and value constant skill development. You will be involved in all areas of software testing including:

Besides this, as a strong team member, you will be expected to:

  • Join your team in all the scrum rituals and procedures
  • Promote and embrace constant improvement culture
  • Develop an expertise area but accept team ownership for the deliveries in good quality

 

The tasks of the tester are to ensure that the functionality implemented corresponds to the expectations via manual and automated tests. You will be a part of the big Front Office agile train of developers and testers, where you have colleagues located in Kiev, Copenhagen and London. Furthermore, you will be a part of a professional development department with 450 employees in Denmark, Germany, Ukraine and UK, releasing SimCorp Dimension functionality twice a year.

 

Your qualifications

We expect you to:

  • have experience or interest in software testing and be eager to learn

  • be able to plan your own work, navigate within multiple priorities, demonstrate strong ability to execute against the deadlines
  • have good English communication skills both written and spoken

name: QA Engineer (Mobile)
description:
Friendly Cactus - це київська геймдев компанія з тривалою історією в понад п'ять років і амбітними планами на майбутнє. Ми створюємо якісні комп'ютерні та мобільні ігри, розробляємо тільки власні проекти, тож саме від наших рішень залежить, якими ці проекти побачить світ.

 

Для нас має величезне значення:

  • твій досвід роботи QA (від одного року) з мобільними додатками (iOS, Android);
  • досвід створення і ведення тестової документації (чек-листи, тест кейси, баг репорти);
  • уважність, вміння планувати свою роботу;
  • досвід роботи с JIRA;
  • навички саморозвитку та роботи у команді;
  • вміння слухати і враховувати різні точки зору, сприймати критику;
  • знання англійської на рівні 'читаю статті, книжки та Stack Overflow';
  • чималий ігровий досвід та цікавість до ігрової галузі в цілому.

 

Ми дбаємо про:

  • нетривіальні задачі та постійне вдосконалення workflow;
  • регулярний фідбек та перспективу професійного зростання;
  • затишне робоче місце - сучасний офіс з великою кількістю рослин і квітів;
  • плідну співпрацю на постійній підставі, оплачувані дні відпочинку;
  • навчання та участь у професійних заходах;
  • своєчасну винагороду.

 

Основні завдання:

  • тестування мобільних ігор (Android, iOS);
  • свідома та ефективна взаємодія з командою.

 

Наш культурний код:

  • ми формуємо команду найкращих і шукаємо особистість з особливим, професійним світоглядом як системою ставлення до себе і до роботи, професійною мотивацією;
  • ми працюємо в команді спільно з аналітиками, гейм-дизайнерами та художниками, використовуємо таск менеджери, дотримуємося agile та scrum;
  • ми шукаємо спеціаліста, для якого важлива самореалізація в роботі, який ладен докласти весь свій талант і старанність для досягнення спільної мети.

 

Про головне: як справжній живий організм, наша компанія зростає і змінюється, та разом з цим, ми зберігаємо невимушений дух стартапу та доброзичливе ставлення одне до одного.

Ми не поспішаємо найняти якомога більше людей і дуже уважно ставимось до кожного претендента, тож, якщо вам відгукнулися ці слова, ми будемо раді продовжити спілкування.

name: QA Engineer (Security)
description:
Playtech, a leading gaming software company, is seeking a skilled, persistent and driven Penetration Tester (PT): the PT will be the execution force behind Application Security team's goal of keeping the security posture of Playtech's products, software and development up to policies, standards and best practices. As part of the position's day-to-day activities, the PT will work closely with development teams to scope, define and execute penetration testing on various systems and applications to tack vulnerabilities and security issues before products are officially released.

 

The PT responsibilities include both black and white box testing, interviewing development engineers and staff for possible attack scenarios, using input from other members of Application Security team to create an attack surface to be exploited through the penetration testing, and to review the outcomes with the development teams.

 

The PT will also present security findings to stakeholders, recommend on mitigation options and provide information on feasibility of fix and residual risk, and eventually provide a full report on executed tests, findings, severity, and required actions. To help the development teams improve their security status, the PT will also train staff on topics ranging from basic security testing to automation and advanced attack techniques.

 

Responsibilities:

· Activities:

  • Perform security testing on different system and applications, from white / black / gray box point of view and utilize different vulnerabilities, from web applications issues down to OS and network issues, along with cross-security domains such as user management, data confidentiality, monitoring and availability, system integrity and privilege escalation.
  • Report on the findings to stakeholders including business impact and mitigation plan, prepare demonstrations of successful attacks scenarios to showcase Application Security team's results
  • Perform gap analysis while auditing systems to point out non-conformities between required secure configuration and actual state
  • Utilize free and commercial tools to improve Application Security team's capabilities in the penetration testing domain

· Processes:

  • Create proper testing process that includes scoping, definition, testing, analysis and reporting stages and improve SLA for covering security tests.
  • Assist development teams to take responsibility on basic security testing through training.
  • Develop in-house tools to support reoccurring tests to provide optimal testing of target systems.
  • Maintain and update relevant system and process documentation and develop ad-hoc reports as needed
  • Global Security Group:
  • Cooperate with other teams within Global Security group to achieve mutual goals
  • Evangelize security within company and be an advocate for customer trust
  • Represent the security group and form working relations with development teams to promote all Global Security group's teams.

 

Qualifications:

Penetration testing related experience:

  • Required: Minimum 3 years
  • Advantage: being named as a security 'Hall of Fame' in a known company/service or publishing CVE
  • Significant advantage: Presenting at known conferences (Blackhat, Defcon, CCC, etc.) regarding security testing or research projects.

Higher education in Computer Science (or related domains) or Security certifications:

  • Required: B.Sc. or a proven education in offensive security domain (CEH, LPT, etc.)
  • Significant Advantage: Offensive Security (OSCE/P etc.) or GIAC certifications

Business experience of vulnerability impact and management

  • Required: Providing vulnerability reports with business impact analysis, working with product owner/manager and suggesting remediation
  • Advantage: Working with known security score matrix (CVSS 2/3)
  • Significant advantage: Presenting full scenario of attack (leveraging on multiple vulnerabilities to demonstrate a successful attack)

Practical knowledge of security testing and exploitation

  • Required: Web application at minimum (OWASP Top 10), both client and server side, scripting languages (Python, Bash, Powershell, etc.), stand-alone tools (Burp, OWASP Zap, Fiddler, etc.)
  • Advantage: Mobile security testing (Android/iOS), Programming language framework (Java, JS, PHP, ), Commercial tools (Nessus, AppScan, etc.)
  • Significant advantage: Low level programming, RE (IDA Pro, OllyDbg, etc.), Network and OS security testing (Windows Server / RHEL), Cloud security audit (AWS / Azure), developing customized exploits

Variety of soft skills to ensure optimal work relationship within the organizations

  • Proficient in English (both written and verbal)
  • Exceptional customer service and positive approach
  • Target oriented mindset
  • Ability to break complicated tasks into simple action items

Adhering with team's core values

  • Working smart and efficiently, prioritizing multiple tasks
  • Business enabler, team player, 'can-do' approach
  • Have an ardent desire to continuous education and growth
  • Motivated, assertive and positive

 

If you are creative, 'out of box thinker' and ambitious enough to make a difference in such a large scale international business, you are more than welcome to apply for one of our open positions at Playtech Kiev.

name: Middle/Senior QA Engineer (Manual, Automated Testing)
description:
We are looking for passionate, innovative, results-oriented QA Engineers with the heart-deep commitment to success to be a part of our Team. As a Middle/Senior QA Engineer, you will be involved in both manual and automated testing as well as requirements analysis, tasks estimation, and test documentation creation.

Our customer is the big international telecom company, with HQ in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

 

Responsibilities for this position will include (but are not limited to):

 

  • Analyze user stories for full non-ambiguous requirements
  • Apply effective and relevant test design techniques for test cases creation
  • Write, monitor, and enhance new and existing automation script
  • Ability to enhance existing automation framework for robust executions
  • Automate new features and include them in regression suites
  • Identify and create reusable test data, methods, and frameworks.
  • Create and execute end-to-end manual test cases and test plans for new product features, during release cycles
  • Managing defects by investigating, reporting and tracking to resolution
  • Provide effective measurable test coverage against requirements
  • Proactively identify & share new automation tools/processes/approaches to create, maintain and improve the Software Testing Lifecycle.

 

Successful candidates should correspond to the following required competencies:

 

  • 3+ years' testing experience
  • 1+ year of professional experience in QA Automation
  • Knowledge and experience writing test automation scripts in C#
  • Knowledge using Selenium WebDriver as a frontend Test Automation Frameworks to test responsive web applications
  • Knowledge using backend Test Automation Frameworks from Junit and NUnit such as TestNG
  • Experience with continuous integration processes and tools
  • Experience of working with version control systems
  • Understanding of Continuous Integration and Deployment pipelines
  • Strong knowledge of testing principles, concepts and techniques
  • Experience of bug tracking systems
  • Experience in agile software testing
  • Good knowledge of the English language

 

Following qualifications will be an advantage:

  • ISTQB CTFL certification
  • Experience with TFS (defect tracking, test case management, test execution), MS Test Manager
  • Expertise in performance testing

name: Middle Automation QA Engineer for Testing Center of Excellence
description:
On behalf of Ciklum Testing Center of Excellence we are looking for a Middle Automation QA Engineer to join our Kharkov team on a full-time basis.

 

 

Testing Center of Excellence is looking for technology experts who want to make a positive influence on new business by applying best QA practices and taking ownership.

We are a growing business unit of Ciklum with currently 45 employees, specializing in Software quality assurance. Currently we are dealing with approximately 30 projects simultaneously. Our projects usually last for 6-12 months and our technological focus is mainly on web and mobile technologies. So, you'll have the opportunity to get frequently in touch with new projects, processes, approaches, technologies, and tools. Through direct knowledge exchange with international clients you are an important contributor in making them successful.

Our environment gives you the opportunity to share your professionalism to help team members grow and we support you with training and education in the areas where you want to develop.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Automation of API testing
  • Building and maintaining automated testing frameworks.
  • Integrating automated testing into CI process.
  • Test case adjustments for automated testing needs.
  • Test data and test environment preparations.
  • Making conclusion and reporting about stability of the product under test.
  • Possibility to perform testing activities on several projects, communicate with developers and project managers

 

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of professional experience in QA Automation of Web products
  • 4+ years in QA in total
  • Some experience in creation of automation frameworks from scratch
  • Solid skills in Java and OOP
  • Experience with continuous integration processes and tools (Jenkins, teamcity, or similar).
  • Experience of working with version control systems (e.g. GIT, SVN and others)
  • In-depth knowledge of test automation approaches and procedures
  • Experience with API level testing
  • Experience with HTML parsing
  • Good Knowledge of SQL
  • Good knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types
  • Understanding of Agile/Scrum.
  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer science or relevant
  • Good English skills - Intermediate and above

 

Desirable:

  • Experience with Spring, Drools
  • Some experience with cloud-based automation solutions like saucelabs, browserstack
  • Public Githab or Gitlab, etc account with sourse code examples.
  • Python
  • Selenium

 

Personal qualities:

  • Good analytical skills
  • Good team player, motivated to develop and solve complex tasks
  • Strong communication and problem solving skills
  • Self-motivated, self-disciplined and result-oriented
  • Strong attention to details and accuracy

 

What's in it for you?

  • Very close cooperation with client
  • Possibility to propose solutions on a project
  • Dynamic and challenging tasks.
  • Ability to influence project technologies.
  • Ability to play role of Software Developer Engineer in Test
  • Team of professionals: learn from colleagues and gain recognition of your skills.
  • Low bureaucracy, European management style.
  • Continuous self-improvement.
  • Trainings
  • ISTQB Certification preparation
  • QA knowledge sharing meetings

 

About Ciklum

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain. As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed. Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!
