Мы не боимся бросать вызовы себе и другим, потому что точно знаем, что нужно для построения сильной и успешной команды! Готов ли ты стать новым Монстром и присоединиться к нам?

 

Основные задачи:

  • работа с продуктами Opencart, Joomla, Virtuemart, Shopify;
  • тестирование задач от разработчиков и PM;
  • контроль качества разрабатываемых продуктов;
  • тестирование готовых продуктов: проверка соответствия продукта техническому заданию, замыслу дизайнера (psd) и выполнение норм чеклиста;
  • тестирование новых компонентов;
  • регулярный просмотр багов, приходящих из техподдержки, с целью корректировки чеклиста и избежания их повторения в будущем;
  • своевременная актуализация чеклиста, внесение изменений согласно требованиям PM, разработчиков;
  • написание внутренней документации согласно описанию задачи и ТЗ, постоянное обновление документации.

 

Что для нас важно:

  • опыт работы QA (полгода-год);
  • базовые знания Html, css, js, MySQL, SQL Server;
  • понимание жизненного цикла бага;
  • основы веб-дизайна;
  • GIT, Jira;
  • Agile, Scrum, Kanban;
  • способность развиваться и желание учиться;
  • умение работать в команде.

 

Будет плюсом:

  • знание продуктов Opencart, Joomla, Virtuemart, Shopify;
  • опыт работы на аналогичной должности.

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • комфортный офис в центре Николаева + дружная команда профессионалов;
  • полная занятость, пятидневка, 8-часовой рабочий день;
  • множество корпоративных плюшек;
  • бесплатный English Club внутри проекта для совершенствования языковых навыков;
  • активный отдых, оздоровительные и досуговые мероприятия на постоянной основе: футбол, баскетбол, теннис, спортзал и другие;
  • профессиональное развитие наших ребят, компенсация посещений конференций и тренингов;
  • поддержка и развитие сферы IT в нашем городе, проведение айти-клубов;
  • участие в социальных, экологических и благотворительных акциях.

 

Больше информации о нас здесь:

  • facebook.com/hr.tm.ua

 

Если в этом описании ты увидел себя, тебе интересно, и ты готов присоединиться к нашей команде, тогда отправляй свое резюме!

 

Будем рады видеть в нашей команде!

name: Internship for Developer position
description:
Date: Mar 28, 2018

Location: Lviv, 46, UA

Company: Ericsson

 

Job Summary:

We are now looking for a Developer to maintain products. Your role will include development activities such as: software design, troubleshooting, verification, product documentation. Our focus is on Lean and Agile ways of working. We organize in cross functional development teams in which continuous improvement, innovation and knowledge sharing is part of the daily work.

 

Responsibilities:

 

  • Troubleshooting and customer support

  • Develop and test high quality products

  • Develop competence in technical domain

 

Key Qualifications:

 

  • Basic knowledge of product development and testing

  • Ability to quickly learn and ask questions

  • Analytical thinking Working with people and networking

  • Innovating, adapting and responding to change

  • Intermediate or upper-intermediate English level

 

Preferable skills:

 

  • GSM knowledge

  • Knowledge of any high level programming language

  • Scripting langueges knowledge

  • Knowledge of any version control system

  • Agile Software Development methodology awareness

  • Assembler knowledge

 

Why is Ericsson a great place to work?

 

Ericsson is the driving force behind the Networked Society where every person and every industry is empowered to reach their full potential. Mobility, broadband and the cloud are transforming the world, enabling industries and society to provide better services, capture new opportunities, improve businesses, increase efficiency, and create new user experiences.

Our services, software and infrastructure support every major telecom operator in the world. The transformation that this brings allows people, business and society to fulfill their potential and build a more sustainable future.

With some 115,000 employees and customers in 180 countries, we combine global scale with technology and services leadership. We support networks that connect more than 2.5 billion subscribers. 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic is carried over Ericsson networks. And our SEK 100 billion investment in research and development over the last three years ensure that our solutions - and our customers - are at the forefront of innovation.

At Ericsson, we give our employees the freedom to think big. Your ideas and innovations can turn into achievements that impact society and change the world. Are you ready to be a change-maker? Learn what makes YOU + Ericsson a powerful combination. Join us today.

Founded in 1876, Ericsson has its headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden. Net sales in 2014 were SEK 228.0 billion (USD 33.1 billion). Ericsson is listed on NASDAQ OMX stock exchange in Stockholm and the NASDAQ in New York.

 

Ericsson provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, national origin, ethnic background, age, disability, political opinion, social status, veteran status, union membership or genetics.

Ericsson complies with applicable country, state and all local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location across the world in which the company has facilities. In addition, Ericsson supports the UN Guiding Principles for Business and Human Rights and the United Nations Global Compact.

This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, training and development.

Ericsson expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, national origin, ethnic background, age, disability, political opinion, social status, veteran status, union membership or genetic information.

name: Quality Manager
description:
We are looking for a skilled Quality Manager with a good background in ISO 9001. A candidate is expected to be able to support Quality Management Systems of IT Company. A Quality Manager maintains existing QMS, monitors fulfillment of QMS requirements and advises on the performance of the quality management system.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Development and actualization of process regulations
  • Quality management:
  • Gathering and analyzing information about the facts and risks of deviation of business processes and products quality output from the established quality requirements
  • Consultations of employees on process-related issues
  • Examinations/audits/assessments of the entire quality management system; results analysis
  • Systematization and management of quality data
  • Management of Software Quality Assurance processes at the level of projects/operating activities
  • Quality improvement:
  • Initiating and monitoring the execution of the required corrective measures and risks
  • Analysis of information about the degree of compliance with Customer requirements, quality - management system efficiency, and efficiency of its elements
  • Initiating and launching the works aimed at improvement of the quality management system and its elements
  • Managing changes in company regulations
  • Development of procedures and manuals related to management of process-related - documents
  • Development of basic document templates, coordination of special template development
  • Performing integrity checks and quality management system completeness checks in the part of process documentation creation, updating, auditing
  • QMS documentation repository management (SharePoint)

 

Requirements:

  • At least 2 years of quality assurance experience
  • Background in QMS maintenance
  • Experience in establishing processes
  • Good level in supporting QMS internal audits
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Expert knowledge of MS Office
  • At least Intermediate level of English and good writing skills

 

Additional requirements:

  • ISO 9001 certificate
  • Experience in QMS development and maintenance
  • Knowledge of ISO 27001 is desirable

name: Software Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
GlobalLogic Ukraine is inviting a Software Quality Assurance Analyst to join its Kyiv office.

Due to intensive growth, GlobalLogic Automotive department is glad to invite Process Engineer to Automotive project. Our clients are Tier 1s from Europe and USA and development is targeted to solutions what will be deployed in newest European and USA cars. The project is considered as technical excellent and we are paying huge attention to technical challenge motivation of our team members as well as excellence compensation.

We offer:

  • Interesting and challenging opportunity in a large and dynamically developing company
  • Exciting projects involving newest technologies
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package, performance bonus program
  • Modern and comfortable office facilities

Requirements

  • 3+ years industry experience (Process Engineering, QA Engineering, Business Analytics, Process Auditing or similar),
  • Ability to analyze and interpret complex and complicated documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards and regulations),
  • Familiar with software development lifecycle,
  • Strong knowledge and understanding of software quality assurance concepts and practices,
  • Test design and test coverage techniques based on risk analysis,
  • Strong analytical skills,
  • Strong team player,
  • Good English is a must.

Preferences

  • Experience in process modelling, assessment and improvement,
  • Familiar with Automotive SPICE and International Standards ISO 9001 or IEC 61508 / ISO 26262 etc,
  • Model based development techniques and tools (e.g. EnterpriseArchitect or similar),
  • Process and Requirements modelling techniques (BPMN, SysML),
  • Proactivity and time management skills,
  • Experience with Agile practices.

Responsibilities

  • Quality assurance activities according to relevant standards,
  • Control of software verification activities,
  • Analyzing software and standards requirements,
  • Research established processes and defining areas of its improvement and integration to company's global quality management system,
  • Development, deployment and maintenance of ASPICE and ISO 26262 related guidelines and instructions,
  • Coach and support engineers for the standards compliance specific activities,
  • Reviews with product teams to ensure standards are being met throughout product development cycles,
  • Assessing project activities against established procedures, standards and regulations (automotive embedded software development).

name: QA Engineer
description:
Love technology? Expert at what you do? Want to be part of the next big thing in hosting?

 

 

OnApp develops software that enables hosting providers to deploy and manage cloud hosting services more quickly and easily than ever before.

 

Our team is young, hard working and motivated-working together to provide the best quality service we can. Our company is growing fast and we need to grow our team to meet the demand. We search for QA Engineers in LVIV with strong knowledge and working experience in:

 

Requirements:

 

  • Experience working as QA Engineer for 1+ year is a must!

 

Knowledge of:

 

  • Python automation
  • Linux (RedHat based) command line+ default linux services (syslog, cron, ssh, nfs, etc)
  • Apache/Nginx web servers
  • DNS
  • SSL certificates
  • Knowledge of RDB, MySQL in particular, NoSQL DB experience as well
  • HTTP, HTTPS protocols
  • Understanding of web based application technology and architecture
  • Upper-Intermediate English reading and writing skills
  • Have an eye for a detail and a strong will for work

 

Optional skills:

 

  • Knowledge of Ruby programming languages/bash scripting and experience with Rspec is a big plus
  • Networking knowledge
  • VMware VCenter/vCloud

 

Benefits:

 

  • The opportunity to work at fast growing company with its own product that is at the forefront of its industry
  • Competitive salary
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Welcoming atmosphere (awesome team of professionals always ready to help on the way)
  • 20 working days paid vacation
  • Paid sick leave
  • Health insurance
  • Stable product company (8 years on the market in Lviv)
  • Free English classes (individual approach in working hours)
  • Free, daily lunch (choose from at least 5 different meals a day)
  • Drinks and fruits
  • Beer Fridays (sometimes with a barbecue - and yes, we have one)
  • Monthly technical literature/podcast/screen-cast/etc. purchase of your choice
  • Use your laptop for work and get additional $50/month for 2 years
  • Comfortable office (individual working place with up-to-date computers and 2 monitors, a comfy chair, own patio, game room, shower, car and bike parking, security, 24/7/365 inside-out availability, and much more)
  • Help with relocation (cost of travel and 1 month's apartment rent is covered for you)
  • Corporate leisure activities
  • Always loaded with tons of interesting tasks where you can challenge and bring yourself and the company to a whole new level

 

We are looking for talented and motivated people to join our team. If you are a talented individual that meets the requirement above, please apply.

 

We look forward to getting to know you.

name: QA/QC Engineer
description:
В связи со стремительным развитием и расширением деятельности компании приглашаем в нашу команду специалиста на должность QA/QC Engineer.

 

О компании:

Squro - это динамично развивающаяся IT компания, которая предоставляет широкий спектр высококачественных продуктов, решений и сервисов в сфере информационных технологий, используя лучшие практики, отраслевые стандарты, современные методологии разработки и эффективно организованную систему управления проектами.

 

С момента основания в 2006 году, Squro приобрела репутацию инновационной и надежной компании среди наших партнеров по всему миру. Мы считаем, что наши сотрудники - это основа нашего успеха и мы всегда рады пригласить к сотрудничеству талантливых людей, по-настоящему увлеченных сферой информационных технологий.

 

Необходимые навыки:

  • Опыт работы от на аналогичной должности от года
  • Понимание жизненного цикла разработки программного обеспечения
  • Умение составлять тестовые сценарии и описывать дефекты
  • Практический опыт выполнения различных видов тестирования, подготовки тестовых данных и отчетности
  • Опыт работы с требованиями к программному обеспечению
  • Опыт тестирования API, веб и мобильных приложений
  • Понимание методологий тест-дизайна (разбиение на классы эквивалентности, анализ граничных значений и т.д.)
  • Общее представление о web-технологиях, понимание для чего и где используется: JSON, CSS, HTML, HTTP
  • Высокая обучаемость, интерес к новым технологиям, стремление к профессиональному росту

 

Будет плюсом:

  • Опыт работы с Linux
  • Опыт автоматизации тестирования
  • Опыт тестирования на проникновение

 

Основные задачи:

  • Работа с бизнес требованиями, их верификация и валидация
  • Ручное тестирование сайта
  • Автоматизация процесса тестирования
  • Базовое тестирование на проникновение

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • Высокую заработную плату
  • Работа над собственным проектом компании (финтех)
  • Много возможностей для личного и профессионального развития
  • Кофемашина, фрукты, йогурты
  • Корпоративный тренажерный зал
  • Комфортные условия работы, современный офис

 

Если Вас заинтересовала данная вакансия, пожалуйста, отправьте Ваше резюме на e-mail: job@squro.com

 

Более подробно о компании Squro можно узнать на сайте: http://squro.com

Контактный телефон: +38 (061) 708-24-28

name: Mobile App Submit Manager
description:
We are looking for tech-savvy, attentive to details specialist to join our Submit Team who enjoys working with mobile applications on every stage of their lifecycle. You'll be responsible for building and submitting mobile Apps, making adjustments to App's source code and do testing.

You have to feel comfortable working with the same list of responsibilities day by day.

 

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Manage Apps' lifecycle

  • Quality Assurance and Quality Control

  • Keep all app data structured and easily accessible and manageable

  • Consistently strive to improve the speed and accuracy of your work

 

REQUIREMENTS

  • Android and/or iOS experienced user

  • Mac OS or Linux power user

  • Manual QA testing experience

  • Attention to detail and care about quality

  • Good communication skills

  • Intermediate written and spoken English

  • Technical Education is a plus

 

BENEFITS

  • Unique work environment where you can take part in creating a new and innovative product

  • Committed and talented team that shares your values and is driven to succeed

  • Onboarding program and mentorship to shorten your ramp-up time

  • Corporate library and opportunity to order any books you'd like to read

  • Access to corporate accounts on educational platforms like Pluralsight and Udemy

  • English classes with a native speaker

  • Great office located in central Kyiv

 

ABOUT US:

Attendify is an event technology company. Our core product is a mobile event app used at conferences, exhibitions, corporate meetings and other events. Attendify in numbers:

  • 70+ team members worldwide operating as a united team

  • 10K+ events served all time

  • Top-5 markets: the US, Canada, UK, Germany, and Australia

  • 5K+ clients, among them Google, Facebook, Bloomberg, PepsiCo, and UEFA

 

Ready to work in an ambitious, fast-paced environment? Send us your resume and we'll get in touch with you.

name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
Candidate will be a member of the Support Tool Engineering team and will be responsible for automated and manual testing software products for web/win/mobile applications. As a quality assurance engineer, the candidate will play a key role in creating and supporting test processes, tools, and methodologies within the team.

 

Responsibilities:

 

  • Develop, execute, maintain automation scripts and keyword tests.
  • Manual test of software applications, APIs and services.
  • Actively use Perforce and Svn revision control systems.
  • Work with issue tracking and release automation management systems Jira, Bamboo.
  • Report generation, administration and maintenance archives.
  • Perform debugging and root cause analysis of component failures and customer reported issues.
  • Independent validation of product performance.
  • Member of Agile/Scrum project development team(s).

 

We OFFER:

 

  • Challenging tasks with using of modern technologies.
  • Company with good reputation on market since 1992 (https://cranepi.com.ua), part of Crane Co. (http://www.craneco.com).
  • Competitive salary, bonus and medical plan.
  • Friendly environment.
  • Learn and Use of English.
  • Flexible working schedule.
  • Lunch Bonus program.
  • 5% travel to US, UK but not limited.

 

Job Requirements:

 

  • Bachelor Degree in Electrical or Software Engineering.
  • 5+ years proven experience in manual testing.
  • Experience in automated testing tools/frameworks like TestComplete, Visual Studio Test Professional, GoogleTest, Selenium, NUnit, jUnit will be a plus.
  • Able to create automation scripts in one of the languages Python, C#, VB, Java or C++ will be a plus.
  • Experience using software development tools and environments Visual Studio, Eclipse.
  • Knowledge of Windows, Linux and Android platforms on user level.
  • Basic understanding of serial communication, network and USB protocols.
  • Intermediate spoken English is a must.
  • Responsible for writing test reports.
  • ICTQB certification is a plus.

 

ABOUT US:

Crane Co. Background Crane Co. is a diversified manufacturer of highly engineered industrial products. Founded in 1855, Crane provides products and solutions to customers in the aerospace, electronics, hydrocarbon processing, petrochemical, chemical, power generation, automated merchandising, transportation and other markets. The Company has five business segments: Aerospace & Electronics, Fluid Handling, Engineered Materials, Merchandising Systems and Controls. Crane has approximately 11,000 employees in North America, South America, Europe, Asia and Australia. Crane Co. is traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE:CR).

 

CPI Summary:

Crane Payment Innovations delivers a full suite of automated money handling systems, including bill and coin validators, bill and coin recyclers, and coin dispensing equipment aimed at the gaming, amusement, retail, self-service, transportation and vending markets. CPI offers the widest range of components for integrated payment systems available today. CPI is a $600 million company and employees 2000 Associates in 21 countries.

name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
CodeTiburon is looking for a Manual QA Engineer to join our team on a full-time basis.

 

Job responsibilities:

  • Manual testing of web, desktop and mobile applications.

  • Creation and maintaining of Test Plans, Test Cases and Check Lists.

  • Collaboration with project managers and software development teams to determine testing procedures.

What you need for this position:

  • Understanding the principles of manual testing. We expect you to work closely with developers to make hard-to-test features more testable. Ensure that applications we develop are functional and provide a great user experience.

  • You need to be logical, detail-oriented, capable of working in a team, and have strong technical and communication skills.

  • Interact daily with the systems for professional software development: Redmine and JIRA.

Requirements:

  • 1 years+ of industry experience (QA Engineer).

  • Strong knowledge of theory and best practices in software testing.

  • Strong knowledge of software development life-cycle.

  • Ability to analyze and interpret complex documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards and regulations).

  • Intermediate English.

name: QA Engineer
description:
Международная компания Skywell LLC с офисами в странах: Великобритания, США и Украина рассматривает кандидатов на вакансию QA Engineer

 

 

Основные Требования:

  • Опыт тестирования ПО от 2 лет;
  • Знание методологии и принципов тестирования ПО;
  • Знание общих принципов организации разработки ПО;
  • Хорошее понимание веб-технологий (HTML/CSS/JSON/JS);
  • Практический опыт работы в Agile/Scrum процессах;
  • Опыт создания и ведения тестовой проектной документацию (тестирование требований, разработка тест-планов, тест-кейсов, отчетов по тестированию, пользовательской документации);

 

Личные качества:

  • Отличные аналитические и коммуникационные навыки;
  • Проактивность.

 

Будет плюсом:

  • Опыт работы в проектах на Magento 1/2;
  • Опыт тестирования web-based, e-commerce приложений;
  • Опыт тестирования мобильных приложений;
  • Понимание принципов клиент-серверной архитектуры
  • Опыт использования Postman
  • Опыт работы с Atlassian stack (Jira / Bitbucket / Confluence);
  • Навыки составления SQL запросов.

 

 

Основные обязанности:

  • Ручное тестирование веб и мобильных приложений;
  • Анализ бизнес и технических требований;
  • Участие в планировании;
  • Ведение документации по тестированию (Requirements, Test Plan, Test Cases, Test Report);
  • Организация внедрения нового программного обеспечения для автоматизации тестирования;
  • Организация выполнения приемочного тестирования, координация работ;
  • Взаимодействие с командой;
  • Автоматизация тестирования ключевой бизнес логики.

 

Условия работы:

  • Обмен опытом;
  • Профессиональный и карьерный рост;
  • Высокую и своевременную оплату труда;
  • Социальный пакет (больничные и отпускные);
  • Современный офис: опен спейс, современная техника, игровая комната, зона отдыха, паркоместо, чай/кофе, фрукты и печенье);
  • English speaking club;
  • Оплату курсов, тренингов, семинаров, книг и всего, что касается повышения квалификации;
  • Возможность реализовать собственные проекты с привлечением ресурсов компании (при утверждении бизнес-плана СЕО);
  • Задачи «с вызовом», позволяющие постоянно совершенствоваться, как профессионал;
  • Еженедельные корпоративные мероприятия (техликбезы, барбекю, боулинг, квесты и тд.)
  • График работы пн - чт с 9:00 до 18:00, пт с 9:00 до 17:00;
  • Oфис недалеко от метро Олимпийская.

name: Middle QA Manual Engineer for BIScience
description:
On behalf of BIScience, Ciklum is looking for Middle QA Manual Engineer to join Kyiv team on full-time basis.

 

An exciting and unique opportunity to become a part of Scrum team that develops a cloud SAAS product which monitor 30,000,000 sites around the world. The Product runs on hundreds of servers which generate 100G of new data which needs to be crunch using big data analytics tool in order to provide insights for our customers. We are now expanding and plan to monitor not only Websites but also Mobile devices and Videos.

 

Client details

BIScience offers business intelligence solutions for online advertising activities. Our solutions maximize our clients' profits by providing insights and analytics of their online presence compared to specific competitors and entire market segments. All of our solutions are secure, reliable, intuitive, and usable. BIScience offers flexible packaging to accommodate the needs of small and medium businesses as well as large enterprises.

 

Client's website: biscience.com

 

Responsibilities:

  • Assure product quality;
  • Define and perform functional and performance test plans and strategies;
  • Assist the development team to oversee problematic areas, underestimated risks, scopes and bottlenecks;
  • Identify, report and track product defects;
  • Prepare testing status reports;
  • Continually identify new ad-types that are not supported by the system;
  • Check for the new information on industry sources like IAB, Adservers documentation
  • Creating and maintaining test suites according to product specifications;
  • Take part in requirements management, change management, risk management;
  • Drive solution for production problems within a given SLA (Service Level Agreement).

 

Requirements:

  • More than 2 years of QA experience;
  • Experience with SQL
  • Experience with JavaScript/HTML
  • Knowledge of HTTP/REST
  • UNIX knowledge
  • Experience with GIT, JIRA, Confluence;
  • Capable of reasoning and thinking through problems;
  • Good knowledge of quality concepts, standards and practices;
  • Experience in writing test documentation and analyzing development documentation;
  • Experience in working with requirements and testing requirements;
  • Experience with testing high availability systems;
  • Good communicator, good level of English.

 

Desirable:

  • Knowledge in advertising industry
  • Knowledge of software development cycle, Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and XP practices;
  • Appropriate education in computer science/informatics/telecommunications;
  • Experience in writing business documentation (manuals, helps etc);

 

What's in it for you?

  • Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
  • Various technical seminars
  • Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
  • Competitive salary
  • Career and professional growth
  • State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

name: Installation, Configuration Test Engineer
description:
GlobalLogic Ukraine is inviting a Installation / Configuration Test Engineerto join its Kyiv office.

Our client is a world-leading provider of telecom equipment, solutions and services to mobile and fixed network operators and telecom providers all over the world. We are working on a long-term program to build end-to-end solution for IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service).

Imagine yourself a company that requires data centre capabilities for daily operations. Ultimately you are facing few challenges:

  • Buying, maintaining and serving hardware is costly
  • Software Licenses (at least OS) are adding cost as well
  • Scaling up or down takes a lot of time and resources involved

In the same time you obviously have concerns about giving away your essential data to the 3rd-party, and still want to be able to access and control your business applications.

The goal is to solve these problems in partnership with local Telcos by providing end-to-end system management solution designed specifically for IaaS. The solution makes end user able to define, order and provision in real time:

  • Own data centres
  • Virtual machines with required memory and processing power
  • Virtual networks
  • Applications installed on virtual machines

Our solution is being built based on existing system management products, 3rd-party products and new applications designed for IaaS.

The current GlobalLogic team includes 40+ engineers working on all of the components of the solution to develop new features end-to-end.

We offer:

  • Interesting and challenging opportunity in a large and dynamically developing company
  • Exciting projects involving newest technologies
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package, performance bonus program
  • Modern and comfortable office facilities

Requirements

  • BA, MS degree in software engineering, computer science, or related field
  • 2+ years overall commercial experience in software quality assurance / testing / test automation
  • Experience in installation / configuration testing is a plus
  • Good knowledge of Linux, Openstack/KVM virtualization, bash-scripting
  • Good knowledge of IP networking
  • Good understanding of different testing types, levels and technics
  • Understanding of Agile or iterative development lifecycles
  • Intermediate and above English (read / write / speak) for daily communication with team leads and subject matter experts

Preferences

  • Understanding of performance, reliability, failover, high availability aspects of the system
  • Experience in test automation with Java Core / JUnit / SOAP or REST
  • Maven / Jenkins / Git / Gerrit / Eclipse experience

Responsibilities

  • Perform infrastructure-related testing of the developed software that includes installation, upgrade, maintenance and tuning of the software on several different hardware configurations (standalone, high-available, geo-redundant)
  • Perform functional software testing via manual test cases and different types of regression mechanisms
  • Perform troubleshooting of found issues and create bug reports
  • Tracking of the registered bugs: fix verification, documentation changes
  • Installation and support of test environments (OpenStack, Oracle, PostgreSQL)
  • Contribution to automation test framework with new automated functional tests
  • Contribution during Technical Requirements review
  • Creation of Test-Cases and Test-Suites based on Technical Requirements

name: Test Manager
description:
Job purpose

Test and Release Lead will be responsible for managing the testing, integration and release management for a portfolio of applications within Digital BSS.

Test and Release Lead will strive to accelerate the delivery of new services while improving stability, performance, and uptime by working closely with the operations team and support adoption of DevOps principles.

Test and Release Lead will also oversee the Quality Assurance team to ensure that the appropriate level of testing occurs to support high-quality enterprise software releases into production.

 

Duties and responsibilities

  • Work closely with the Operations team to improve stability, performance, and uptime of application.
  • Planning, organization, and tracking of the daily team of testers activities.
  • Individual and team contribution to testing process improvements.
  • Regular reporting on issues and suggestion of issue resolutions.
  • Testing of complex integration between several systems.
  • Tight collaboration with SW Delivery Manager and customers for synchronization of individual and team activities with the company activities.
  • Detailed tracking of found issues and tasks in the defect management system.
  • Provision of issue-related information to other team members upon the first request.
  • Definition of possible dependencies and expected inputs for the quick and correct task execution.
  • Regular monitoring of the testing progress and verification that it meets the specified deadlines.
  • Collaboration with the team members and provision of an individual upon the first request.
  • Constant development of skills and mastering new methods for better issue identification.
  • Close work in a team for revealing the potential of individual teammates and guidance of junior colleagues.
  • Evaluation of team and individual performance, feedback provision, and guidance of the improvement activities.
  • Communication of team results to SW Delivery Manager, team members, and customers.
  • Organize preparation\negotiation\sign of plan\protocol of testing.
  • Create regress checklists for each system.
  • Manage test SIM cards, test FTTB accounts, and test devices
  • Preparing test data for testing.
  • Running and updating the existing QA processes.
  • Participation in interviewing new QA candidates.
  • Work closely with the architectural team on coordinating the technical roadmap, planning architectural changes, facilitating solution design and platform development activities.
  • Demonstrated ability to define and communicate strategy and vision and influence across the Enterprise is essential.
  • Demonstrated ability to effectively inspire and influence teams and partners in delivering technology enabled business solutions that meet business needs.
  • E2E Test plan and overall coordination of test execution.
  • E2E delivery of new solutions: new applications and modules for existing applications
  • Automation and monitoring at all steps of software construction, from integration, testing, releasing to deployment, driving DevOps principals.
  • Recommend process and/or system improvement, which will lead to improvement in applications and customer service.
  • Participate in meetings with users to ensure service levels and project deliverables are being met.
  • Balance team structure to support delivery expectations, enterprise quality, and team development.

 

Skills

  • About 4 years of experience in an IT Application Development and Maintenance Services out of which min 3- 5 years related to Testing and Release Management.
  • Telco environments understanding and experience is mandatory, basic knowledge of GSM, IP Networking, as a plus.
  • Knowledge and experience of multi-vendor IT operations is a plus.
  • Subject matter expertise on Billing Systems.
  • Mandatory: Experience with SQL, PL/ SQL.
  • Working experience with following protocols: CAPv2, REST, XML RPC, CAI 3G, SOAP, Diameter, Diameter Gx, Diameter Gy as a plus.
  • Experience with UNIX system, SQL, HTTP, SOAP, REST, Telnet.
  • Expertise in testing web and mobile client-server applications.
  • Experience in automating the testing processes.
  • Knowledge of Waterfall and Agile (Scrum/Kanban) methodologies.
  • Experience in using/combining different testing methodologies.
  • Strong technical background and understanding of the development processes (SDLC, ITIL).
  • Strong experience with JIRA and related tools (JiraMHWeb, qTest Manager, HP QC).
  • Experience in planning, implementation, and support of business application components, including change and release management.
  • Customer orientation with an excellent understanding of telco service providers.
  • A sense of urgency with quality as a key deliverable.
  • Strong background in managing/effecting change.
  • Extensive experience with the interpretation of quality indicators to detect weaknesses in the unit's operations and implement corrective action.
  • Presentation & Communication skills.
  • Knowledge sharing and collaboration skills.
  • Good verbal and written communication skills in English (at least Intermediate).

 

Location

  • Ukraine, Kiev

 

We offer

  • Possibility to build your career, learn and develop together with others in a truly international company
  • A possibility to shape the future and build the Networked Society
  • Competitive Ericsson compensations & benefit package

В первой строчке сопроводительного письма первым словом укажите слово 'Внимательность' (для понимания, что Вы ознакомились со всеми требованиями к вакансии).

  • Опыт тестирования API (SOAP, REST) • Понимание форматов JSON и XML
  • Знания инструментов тестирования: JMeter, SoapUI, Postman
  • Базовые знания SQL
  • Понимание основных принципов методологии разработки ПО (Waterfall, Scrum) • Опыт работы с системой управления проектами и задачами (Jira, Redmine)
  • Знание английского языка на уровне Intermediate (чтение технической документации)
  • Опыт работы в тестировании от 2-х лет
  • Знание основ тестирования ПО, техник тест-дизайна, видов и типов тестирования
  • Опыт разработки плана и методики тестирования

 

Будет плюсом

  • Опыт автоматизации тестирования (web-)приложений • Тестирование мобильных приложений на платформе (iOS, Android)
  • Опыт тестирования сервисов с использованием очередей сообщений (message broker)
  • Опыт написания тестов на Python
  • Опыт выполнения проектов в банках или телекоммуникационных компаниях

 

Предлагаем

  • Работу в команде профессионалов
  • Возможность профессионального развития: оплата курсов и сертификация, обучение за счет внутренней экспертизы (ежемесячные презентации)
  • Медицинскую страховку или абонемент в спортзал на выбор
  • Ежегодный оплачиваемый отпуск (24 календарных дня) и оплату больничных
  • Комфортное рабочее место
  • Корпоративные мероприятия и тимбилдинги
  • Разнообразные плюшки в виде кофе, фруктов, Xbox и турника.

name: Integration and Testing Engineer
description:
Daily activities

You have unique opportunity to be part of the teams of experts developing the telecommunication systems deployed worldwide.

In everyday work, you will plan, design, review, execute and maintain tests in own area.

You will be responsible for debugging, isolation and resolving of various issues . You will have a chance to apply knowledge and experience to determine failure's root cause. In your role, you will work in close co-operation to local project people, as well as remote stakeholders. You will interact with telecommunication systems both SW and/or HW areas depending on projects.

 

We have a variety of opened positions for candidates with wide range of work experience - from fresh graduates to highly experienced professionals; with hardware and software background. The more experienced you are, the greater opportunities you have.

 

We work with:

  • Perl, Bash, Python
  • telecommunication systems 2G/3G/4G/5G
  • IP networks
  • UNIX or/and Linux
  • advanced measurement equipment
  • cloud computing

 

Our expectations:

  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Telecommunications, Computer Science, Software Technology or equivalent education
  • knowledge of software and/or hardware testing processes and tools (ISTQB is an advantage)
  • familiarity with some of following areas: Linux, IP networks, telecommunication systems, radio frequency technologies and measurements, scripting
  • analytical thinking
  • teamwork skills
  • good communication in English (both written and spoken)
  • ready to relocate to Wroclaw, living in or nearby

 

If you are not meet all our expectations, it does not matter if you are quickly learner!

name: Senior Integration and Testing Engineer
description:
Daily activities

 

You have unique opportunity to be part of the teams of experts developing the telecommunication systems deployed worldwide.

 

In everyday work, you will plan, design, review, execute and maintain tests in own area. You will be also involved in new features creation process from testers perspective by preparing integration plans and feature implementation aspects with close cooperation with specification and development departments.

 

You will be responsible for debugging, isolation and resolving of issues. You will have a chance to apply knowledge and experience to determine failure's root cause. In your role, you will work in close co-operation to local project people, as well as remote stakeholders. You will interact with telecommunication systems both SW and/or HW areas depending on projects.

 

We work with:

  • Perl, Bash, Python
  • telecommunication systems 2G/3G/4G/5G
  • IP networks
  • UNIX or/and Linux
  • advanced measurement equipment
  • cloud computing

 

Our expectations:

  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Telecommunications, Computer Science, Software Technology or equivalent education
  • extensive knowledge of software and/or hardware testing processes and tools
  • 3+ years of proven experience in software and/or hardware testing
  • expertise in at least three of following areas: Linux, IP networks, telecommunication systems, radio frequency technologies and measurements
  • proven advanced testing scripts applications will be a bonus
  • experience in test optimization (including automation)
  • proven contribution to SW and/or HW specification process
  • teamwork skills
  • analitical thinking
  • problem solving skills
  • good communication in English (both written and spoken)
  • ready to relocate to Wroclaw, living in or nearby

name: HW Integration Test Engineer
description:
Daily activities

You will be working with state of the art test measurement equipment and technologies such as high-speed interfaces (Ethernet 1G/10G/25G/40G, CPRI), various serial buses, microprocessor debuggers, DDR memory testing, verification of complex ASICs and FPGA's. To test complex HW we also need know-how on SW integration and coding in Python and other scripting languages.

 

We work with:

  • Python
  • Measurement devices
  • Linux
  • Testing frameworks
  • JIRA/Pronto
  • Version control and code review systems

 

Our expectations:

  • Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Telecommunications, Computer Science, Software Technology or equivalent education
  • experience in digital HW / Embedded systems/ low level SW
  • proficiency in script / programming languages (e.g. Python/Shell/Tcl, Bash, C)
  • experience in hardware / software integration / system testing / test automation
  • measurement equipment's knowledge such as logic analyzers, high speed oscilloscopes, microprocessor debuggers
  • manual capability in handling of electronic boards (modifications including soldering in lab)
  • familiar with high speed interfaces used in telecommunication technology (Ethernet, CPRI)
  • experience with serial buses (IIC, SPI, USB)
  • problem solving skills
  • good communication in English (both written and spoken)

name: QA Team Leader
description:
Playtech is the world's largest online gaming software supplier traded on the London Stock Exchange Main Market, offering cutting-edge, value added solutions to the industry's leading operators. Company's business portfolio consists of the most prominent names in the business, including William Hill, Netplay, Betfred, Mansion, Bet365, etc.

 

Playtech develops unified software platforms and content for the online and land-based gaming industry, together with providing a range of ancillary services such as marketing, hosting and CRM services.

 

Behind the eminent success of Playtech's products and services there are around 5,000 people with offices and development centers in 14 countries, the majority of whom are engaged in research and development of current and future gaming technologies.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Coordinating a team of engineers, both manual and automation tasks
  • Test execution for native mobile applications
  • Implement a consistent test documentation strategy on team level
  • Implement criteria for necessary and enough product test coverage
  • Develop and implement QA metrics
  • Support and improve the test automation strategy
  • Support and improve the agile testing approach
  • Provide help and support in day to day job for test engineers
  • Mentor and train team members and colleagues

 

Required skills:

  • 5+ years of experience in QA, with a proven track record in leading multiple QAs
  • 2+ years as a QA Team Lead
  • Good knowledge and understanding of agile methodologies, ideally experience with Scrum
  • Experience of working with Bug Tracking, Test Management tools
  • Experience in native mobile apps testing
  • Profound experience in technical testing (e.g. reading logs, writing SQL queries, XML, JSON)
  • Fluent English, both written and spoken
  • Self-motivated, self-disciplined and result-oriented
  • Good analytical skills and attention to details
  • Good communications skills
  • Open-minded, proactive team player

 

We offer:

  • Professional growth
  • Educational possibilities
  • Competitive compensation
  • Fully-equipped perfect office space located in the city center ('Palats Sportu' metro station)
  • Warm and friendly attitude to every specialist
  • Possibility to cooperate with a product company

 

If you are creative, 'out of box thinker' and ambitious enough to make a difference in such a large scale International business, you are more than welcome to apply for one of our open positions at Playtech Kyiv. We'll contact you if there's a fit with one of our opportunities.

name: Senior QA Engineer with Way4 Experience, Acquiring Payments Services
description:
Our client is a financial company that specializes in currency transactions: multicurrency payments with dynamic conversion (DCC, Dynamic Currency Conversion), credit card processing, and tax refunds. The main customers of their services are tourists, retailers, commercial banks, and individuals (credit card holders).There are hundreds of tax return points in the 30 countries where our client's offices are located.

 

DataArt's specialists are currently engaged in both manual and automated testing of the new version of the system (Way4, Oracle, .NET) for performing these transactions.

 

Required Skills and Experience:

 

  • Experience working with «Online transaction switch», «Clearing», and «Settlement» payments platforms;
  • Experience working with payment platform Way4;
  • Experience working with end-to-end task management;
  • Experience developing and performing system testing while the system is being migrated/updated;
  • Strong analytical skills, including interpreting system needs and translating into technical requirements;
  • A quick learner that has a track record of identifying and solving problems;
  • The ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks;
  • Willingness to take responsibility, the ability to make sound decisions in a dynamic environment;
  • Ready for occasional business trips;
  • Good spoken English.

 

Additional Competences:

 

  • Experience working directly with clients;
  • Experience working in a distributed team;
  • Payment platform certification.

 

DataArt offers:

 

  • Professional Development:
    - Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
    - The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
    - More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
    - Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
    - Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.
  • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;
  • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;
  • Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely;
  • The ability to work in any of our development centers.

name: Junior Manual QA Engineer
description:

name: Senior QC Engineer
description:
About Client:

Our Client if the Company which delivers the most advanced solar systems, custom financing, and progressive sustainability practices. Their fully-integrated design approach to solar systems, battery storage, and energy monitoring software makes their unique solar solutions a sound investment with greater peace of mind.

Since 1985, the Company has been leading global solar innovation. Their solar panels consistently deliver more energy and long-term peace of mind with the highest performing solar power systems available. The Company is the solar energy choice of more homeowners and businesses around the world and it can be characterized by the following:

  • Client's global headquarters is based in Silicon Valley since 1985
  • Total solar energy generated >18,000,000 megawatt hour (MWh)
  • Diversified global portfolio leading residential, commercial and utility solar energy markets
  • World's highest efficiency solar panels featuring cell technology
  • More than 750 patents for solar technology

 

 

Requirements:

The Client is seeking a bright, self-driven, independent thinking QC engineer for their next-generation digital platform. You will be working with QA's, Software Engineers and Product Managers to produce highly reliable and flexible monitoring products.

 

 

Responsibilities:

  • Implement and execute tests which ensure all products and services meet client requirements, in addition to company standards
  • Perform analysis, reporting, and tracking of defects/issues, using a defined procedure and workflow
  • Perform impact analysis and inspection of all possible items for inaccuracies and completeness of realization based on specifications or requirements, changes to requirements, system changes related to regression testing or defect fixing; preparation of corresponding documents/conclusions to avoid similar problems in the future
  • Identify test design: define scope, expediency, and types of test design and testing according to selected test types to ensure product quality. Find and document product discrepancies and works with other technical personnel on their fixing
  • Prepare internal and external quality reports (test execution, test summary, etc.) at various project stages and define templates for management/client staff review
  • Design, establish, and execute test plans that will be delivered with a product within established specifications
  • Analyze and understand client's business area. Analyzes and evaluates client's requirements and demands properly in the initial project phase when minimum project related information is available. Shares this information between team members
  • Analyze detailed software requirements on the basis of SRS, business area, and communication with the Client
  • Research project areas which can be improved and suggests improvements
  • Cooperate with clients, identify their needs, and manage client requirements and expectations

 

 

Skills and Abilities:

  • Understanding of software developmental life cycles and methodologies (required)
  • Ability to multi-task with multiple priorities and time frames
  • Experience of API testing
  • Knowledge of Salesforce
  • Experience of using bug tracking systems like Pivotal, Jira and test case managing systems like TestRail
  • Knowledge of all possible applications types (such as web, desktop, etc.) and specifics of their testing
  • Ability to prepare test design according to the defined test approach to guarantee full coverage of product specifications or requirements (required)
  • Advanced knowledge of testing techniques: test results should be reliable and should not be additionally validated (required)
  • Ability to perform defect reason analysis, prepare detailed and helpful defect reports with expected results for fixing defects, and perform impact analysis to cover possible influence on a product (required)
  • Suggesting approaches for automation testing according to expediency of different test types (such as automation, performance, load, stress, stability, or integration) (required)
  • Ability to work independently with no supervision (required)
  • Negotiation, interpersonal communication, and influence skills (required)
  • Relationship building skills
  • Team player
  • People motivation skills
  • Result orientation
  • Process orientation
  • Client orientation
  • Planning and estimation skills (required)
  • English level - intermediate Strong and above (required)
  • Experience: at least 4 years' of quality control background (required)

name: QA Engineer
description:

  • Понимание процессов QA на всех этапах разработки программного обеспечения

Обязанности:

name: Тестировщик ПО
description:
QATestLab - ведущая аутсорсинговая IT-компания, которая предоставляет полный спектр услуг тестирования программного обеспечения. Компания представлена в 7 регионах Украины и за 15-летний опыт работы реализовала больше 1000 успешных иностранных проектов в разных областях, установив партнерские отношения с мировыми брендами: Robert Bosch, Shell, G5, Yandex, ComWise и другие.

 

Ищем тестировщика мобильных приложений в г. Полтава, который открыт к новым знаниям и изучению технологий, предпочитает работать в команде, а главное - стремится добиться успехов в QA.

 

Обязанности:

  • тестирование мобильных приложений или игр
  • написание технической документации
  • регистрация дефектов в багтрекинговой системе
  • составление отчетов о результатах тестирования

 

Что необходимо знать и уметь:

  • уровень владения ПК и мобильными устройствами на уровне уверенного пользователя
  • английский язык на уровне Intermediate и выше (обязательное требование)
  • сильная база по теории тестирования ПО
  • владение практическими навыками тестирования ПО
  • понимание жизненного цикла программного обеспечения
  • понимание жизненного цикла бага
  • навыки веб, десктоп и мобайл тестирования (будет плюсом)
  • опыт работы с баг трекинговыми системами Jira, Mantis (будет плюсом)
  • знания операционных систем (iOS, Android)

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • обучение специфике работы
  • официальное трудоустройство
  • 8-часовой рабочий день (Пн-Пт)
  • гибкий график работы
  • комфортабельный офис в центре города
  • молодой и дружный коллектив
  • тимбилдинги, корпоративные ивенты
  • бесплатные обеды + плюшки (фрукты, чай, кофе, печенье)
  • бесплатные курсы английского языка (2 раза /неделю)

 

В QATestLab Вы будете ждать пятницу. Чтобы обыграть коллегу в CounterStrike, посмотреть кино, собраться на Мафию, или поучаствовать в воркшопе.

Не верите? Смотрите наш инстаграм: https://www.instagram.com/qatestlab/

Больше о компании и открытых вакансиях Вы можете узнать на нашем сайте: http://qatestlab.com/

 

Если Вы повсюду замечаете ошибки и хотите связать с этим свою жизнь, присылайте свое резюме на jobs@qa-testlab.com

 

Если у Вас есть вопросы, пишите в Skype: marina.satyr (Марина)

 

Команда тестировщиков ждет своего героя!

name: Middle Manual QA Engineer
description:
Мы - молодая украинская компания, целью создания которой было построение принципиально нового формата взаимоотношений внутри компании, основанных на общих ценностях, желании развиваться и зарабатывать. Создаем, разрабатываем и продвигаем свои проекты на Западные рынки.

Сейчас находимся в поиске Middle Manual QA Engineer

 

Какие профессиональные знания и опыт нам важны:

  • опыт работы в написании планов тестирования, тест-кейсов.
  • знания общей методологии принципов тестирования.
  • опыт тестирования web-приложений.
  • опыт работы с баг-трекинговыми системами (Jira).
  • внимательность к деталям.
  • знания основ HTML, CSS, JavaScript. MySQL как +.
  • знание английского языка - Pre-Intermediate и выше.
  • самоорганизованность.

 

Что будет входить в обязанности:

  • тестирование web-сайтов.
  • написание тест-кейсов.

 

Что мы предлагаем:

  • работать с талантливыми людьми в компании, которая за три года выросла из 3 до 200+ человек.
  • новый современный офис в 10 минутах ходьбы от метро Дружбы Народов.
  • возможность самостоятельно планировать рабочий день (гибкий график).
  • работать со сложными и интересными задачами, которые не дают сидеть на месте.
  • создавать продукты с профессионалами для профессионалов.
  • корпоративы, тимбилдинги, тренинги, семинары, воркшопы.
  • бесплатные курсы английского языка+Speaking Club.
  • конкурентная заработная плата с регулярными пересмотрами.
  • 5 day off в году.
  • недели фруктов и печенек.

 

Мы умеем работать, делая это профессионально, совершенствуя себя и команду. И так же хорошо умеем отдыхать: походы в горы, кальян, пятничные вечера с настольными играми, веселые корпоративы - это все о нас.

 

Наш продукт изначально предназначается на западный рынок. Год за годом он уверенно растет. Уже сейчас некоторые элементы системы не имеют аналогов на рынке. Мы предлагаем свободу действий, интересные задачи, полную поддержку коллектива и руководства здравым идеям.

Если это то, что Вы ищете - ждём Ваше резюме.

name: QA Team Lead (manual)
description:
Обязанности и задачи:

  • Организация и контроль работы QA команды (manual+auto).

  • Организация процесса тестирования программного продукта: определение процессов, процедур и методик тестирования на протяжении всего жизненного цикла продукта.

  • Управление QA командой: структура команды, функционал, подбор, развитие, оценка и т.д.

  • Организация среды тестирования: координация работ по обеспечению необходимым для тестирования оборудованием и программным обеспечением.

  • Участие в создание регламентов и процедур разработки.

  • Внедрение/разработка системы автоматизации, инструментария и среды тестирования.

  • Приемочное тестирование.

  • Проведение нагрузочного тестирования.

 

Для выполнения обязанностей и задач необходимо:

  • Опыт работы в web-тестировании не менее 3-х лет.

  • Знание современных технологий разработки ПО и тестирования.

name: Junior Automation QA Engineer
description:
GlobalLogic Ukraine is inviting a Junior Automation QA Engineer to join its Lviv office.

The project goal is to develop a user and Web interface for a full featured desktop voip phone with support of Miscosoft Lync server for enterprise IP telephony and call centers. The telephones supports up to six SIP lines simultaneously or one Microsoft Lync account, conferences, personal and corporate phone books, call lists etc. The user interface communicates with a voice-over-IP application and contains part of the phone's business logic. The important part of the project is supporting desktop tool for Phone behavior verification on automation mode. The user interface supports a variety of languages, including right-to-left, Cyrillic and hieroglyphic languages. The telephone is part of corporate solution that includes compatible SIP or Microsoft Lync server and entire infrastructure.

We offer:

  • Interesting and challenging opportunity in a large and dynamically developing company
  • Exciting projects involving newest technologies
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Excellent compensation and benefits package, performance bonus program
  • Modern and comfortable office facilities

Requirements

  • Experience in software development or test automation using a combination of C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or script language (TCL is prefered)
  • Technical background, analytical mind with strong investigation skills
  • Knowledge of Networking Protocols (DNS, routing, TCP/IP)
  • Experience working with Windows and Linux
  • Knowledge of testing approaches
  • Intermediate Strong English level

Responsibilities

  • Analyze product and technical user stories and create, document and execute relevant testable scenarios
  • Develop, maintain and enhance test automation framework and test infrastructure as needed
  • Partner with engineers, product managers, and other team members
  • Provide status updates to customer

name: Junior Manual QA
description:

Если в этом описании ты увидел себя, тебе интересно, и ты готов присоединиться к нам, тогда отправляй свое CV!!

name: Senior Automation QA Engineer
description:
Project Overview:

Our customer is a multinational corporation with offices in over 150 countries around the world. Keeping up with technology change they invest in building new generation of software systems and products to support their business: both internal and consumer-facing with hundreds of thousands of users. Our team is going to develop a new kind of a monitoring tool for their immense infrastructure: collecting events and data from various systems it will be able to provide real-time information and insights for IT staff and business users within the organization.

The system will collect data from sources like New Relic, Datadog as well as custom logs and tools and visualize them using Graphana and Angular. Node.js will be used on the backend.

Technology Stack:

  • Frontend: Angular, Graphana , etc.
  • Backend: Microservices with Node.js, Docker, Jenkins.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, create, execute, maintain automated tests;
  • Organizing, planning and performing automated tests;
  • Develop/enhance test automation tools;
  • Organizing non-functional (e.g. performance, load etc.) testing for E2E solutions;
  • Analyze root causes of failed test and report issues/take corrective actions;
  • Make technology/frameworks decisions in conjunction with tech leads to ensure built-in quality in the product;
  • Create test reports and report quality metrics, defect troubleshooting and follow up;
  • Maintain test related documentation.

Requirements:

  • Experience Working Distributed Systems;
  • Experience Designing and Maintaining CI/CD pipelines;
  • Configuration Management (Ansible, Chef, Puppet or others);
  • Programming experience/skills with one or more of the following: Bash, Shell, Python, Java;
  • Infrastructure as code (Terraform, Packer or others);
  • Linux administration;
  • Monitoring systems (Infrastructure, application monitoring, JMX metrics);
  • Agile methodology;
  • Experience working with highly virtualized environments and Containerization;
  • Basic experience with container orchestration (Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, Rancher or other);
  • Experience with AWS Services (IAM, EC2, S3, etc...);
  • Kafka Knowledge is considered a big PLUS.

name: Senior Automation QA Engineer for Derivco
description:
On behalf of Derivco Company, Ciklum is looking for a Senior Automation QA Engineer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

 

 

Derivco is the dev house that provides Microgaming with their exceptional gaming content. They pride themselves on being at the forefront of industry innovation. These highly skilled teams of designers, developers, illustrators and animators love nothing more than working with the latest technology and having fun trying out new ideas.

The software our Customer produces has enabled Microgaming to become one of the most trusted suppliers of online gaming in the world. They don't just create software. They create entertainment experiences.

Our client is the Poker Team, which is part of the Network Games business unit within Derivco. They are a fast paced, technologically proficient and exceptionally talented group of people. The multi-award-winning software platform is technologically diverse and offers challenges in many different areas.

They work hard and of course play hard, but most importantly Derivco don't take themselves too seriously. Their core business values are passion, ownership and care. Our customer believes in own people and shows it! They constantly strives to be better yesterday.

 

Responsibilities:

You will provide testing technical leadership in, development and execution of automated testing for client cross-platform (iOS, Android, Windows, macOS) poker client and the backend services which support it. You will support team alignment with organizational initiatives and objectives, whilst safeguarding and growing product awareness of the poker product.

Additionally, you will work with client's Test Managers, Team Leads, and the other agile team members to lead automation initiatives through the team.

 

Requirements:

Bachelor's Degree, Diploma or Equivalent and 5+ years testing experience with exposure to agile testing environments ISTQB Test Analyst/Manager or equivalent.

The ability to work independently and collaboratively with the team. Integrity, adaptability and excellent communication skills.

A passion for lifelong learning and exceptional problems solving skills. A driven person with good time management and great attention to detail, combined with the ability to deal with ambiguity and drive solutions, independently or collaboratively.

Ninja Skills, as below:

  • Extensive experience automating using WebDriver (Selenium), TypeScript/JavaScript and Ranorex, C#
  • Create and drive automation test strategy and assets
  • Experience of working with version control systems (GIT)
  • Experience Integrating automated testing into CI process using TeamCity
  • Strong testing technical ability across multiple platforms (SQL, Web, Service and Mobile)
  • Good understanding and use of testing Processes and Techniques
  • Great Mentoring/Coaching ability
  • Experience with test analysis, preparation and planning
  • Good knowledge of different testing methods, techniques and types Automation
  • Embracing change in a dynamic agile environment
  • The ability to foresee and create improvements to existing testing procedures as needed.

 

What's in it for you?

You will be working closely with other client development, testing and IT teams located in Durban - South Africa, Douglas - Isle of Mann and Tallinn - Estonia. They need your help in mentoring and coaching more junior automation engineers.

Although our client have a large system, existing standards and well-defined processes, they are always looking for new approaches to take advantage of and are always keen to embrace change! They embrace innovation in everything they do (and hand out some pretty cool prizes for it as well).

Derivco are convinced that they employ some of the smartest people in the business, so if you like being challenged and feel that you could contribute, they look forward to hearing from you!

 

About Ciklum:

Ciklum is a top-five global Software Engineering and Solutions Company. Our 3,000+ IT professionals are located in the offices and delivery centres in Ukraine, Belarus, Poland and Spain.

As Ciklum's employee, you'll have the unique possibility to communicate directly with the client when working in Extended Teams. Besides, Ciklum is the place to make your tech ideas tangible. The Vital Signs Monitor for the Children's Cardiac Center as well as Smart Defibrillator, the winner of the IoT World Hackathon in the USA, are among the cool things Ciklumers have developed.

Ciklum is a technology partner for Google, Intel, Micron, and hundreds of world-known companies. We are looking forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

Join Ciklum and «Cross the Borders» together with us!

name: Младший инженер по качеству (Junior QA Engineer, manual)
description:
О компании

Высший приоритет компании Design and Test Lab - разработка надежного программного обеспечения. В нашей работе мы применяем научные знания при планировании проекта, разработке архитектуры, программировании и тестировании. Наши программисты в обязательном порядке покрывают программы автоматическими тестами, а к клиентам никогда не попадают программы, которые не были протестированы независимым человеком вручную. Наша мантра - 'Мы не пишем без тестов'! Наш лозунг: 'Мы исправляем ошибки за свой счет!' Потому что, если это делать за счет заказчика, то мы заинтересованы делать как можно больше ошибок. Если за свой счет - то мы думаем, как программировать надежно!

Узнайте, что такое надежное программное обеспечение и почему мы пишем тесты, смотрите в лекции Владимира Обризана - к. т. н., директор Design and Test Lab: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1iuKCWajJbI

 

О вакансии

Мы ищем опытного тестировщика, который будет педантично по заранее подготовленным тестовым сценариям тестировать вручную мобильные приложения, веб-сайты, а также интернет-телевизор.

 

О проекте

Проект, который нужно будет тестировать - онлайн-кинотеатр документальных и инди-фильмов. Кинотеатр работает на платформах: веб, iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Android, Roku, Amazon Fire TV. У приложения уже было несколько больших релизов и есть своя пользовательская база: десятки тысяч ежедневных пользователей. Проект долгосрочный.

Команда в проекте распределенная: менеджмент находится в Сан-Франциско, вот почему так важно знать английский язык

 

Требования

  • знание английского языка;
  • навыки ручного тестирования мобильных и веб-приложений;
  • оформление отчетов о найденных ошибках;
  • опыт работы не менее 2 лет;

 

Мы предлагаем:

  • интересный проект на современных технологиях;
  • стремление к техническому совершенству разрабатываемых проектов;
  • 5-дневная рабочая неделя, 8 часов в день;
  • все национальные праздники - выходные;
  • оплачиваемый отпуск: 2 рабочих дня за каждый полный месяц работы;
  • официальное оформление отношений;
  • небольшой дружелюбный коллектив (16 человек);
  • отличный кофе из 'Кофеина'.

 

Контактная информация:

Владимир Обризан, к. т. н., директор Design and Test Lab

050 949-51-09, obrizan@dnt-lab.com

name: QA Engineer (World of Tanks Kyiv)
description:
World of Tanks Kyiv is looking for a QA Engineer to join the Team on a full-time basis. As an QA Engineer you will be focusing on testing of new features and modes for World of Tanks. It will span across all of the game components and systems and cover all phases of development cycle. You will be a part of cross-functional development team whose goal is to flesh out the vision into a product in the Happy Players' hands.

World of Tanks

World of Tanks is a cult MMO game dedicated to armored machines that has won the affection of players all over the world. A variety of in-game locations, historical accuracy, realistic gameplay - join the army of tankers already tearing up the battlefield and plunge into legendary combat! If you haven't, give it a try.

World of Tanks Kyiv

World of Tanks Kyiv is an integral part of the World of Tanks family. We love Tanks, therefor a link to your profile in The Game will fast-track you in the candidates' pipeline. Our main values are Team, Trust, Transparency, and Tanks.

Team:

? We play co-op

? A 35 people cross-functional team of senior tech experts passionate about Tanks and Games

? Key tech stack: Python, C++, Scaleform

? We deliver our own ideas to players (full development cycle)

? We collaborate with 15 Wargaming studios worldwide

? Team hobbies:

? Playing WoT, DotA, and PUBG

? Boardgames

? Literally making tanks (bricks, metal, plastic, etc)

Trust:

? Environment open for innovation, questions, and initiatives

? Management via context

? Minimum to no micromanagement

Transparency:

? Transparent compensation system

? Bonus based on individual contribution to product performance

? Individual Development Plan integrated with education

? Participation in international industry conferences (GDC, Gamescom, E3, etc.)

Tanks:

? Develop new features that will be available to millions of players worldwide

? Whole product focus: client, server, and tools development

? Help shape our own conferences - WG Fest, 4C

Perks:

? 28 days of paid vacation. Covered sick leaves, medical insurance

? Own gym, sports teams: football, yoga, etc.

? Game consoles, hardware at the office

? Snacks, drinks at the kitchen

Responsibilities

? Quality assurance and control for features

? Client-server features testing

? Integration testing between game components, game and web services

? Game development tools testing

? UI elements, Art objects (maps, tanks, etc.), Sound testing

? Creating and maintaining of testing documentation (test suites, test cases, checklists, instructions for testing, etc.)

? Auto-test results processing

? External testing results processing

Requirements

? 2+ years of testing experience

? Understanding specifics of client-server model

? Ability to use testing theory in practice

? Work experience with bug tracking and test management systems (Jira, Redmine)

? Work experience with Version Control Systems (SVN\Perforce\Git)

? Analytical thinking, systems thinking approach in task solution

? Ability to explain complex things by simple words

? Intermediate or higher level of English

Desirable:

? World of Tanks player

? Python knowledge and ability to analyze code

? Knowledge of windows and *nix systems

? Work experience with CI Systems (TeamCity\Jenkins)

? Client-server game development experience

name: Junior QA (Marketing Department)
description:
Шведский издатель и разработчик мобильных игр мирового уровня G5 Entertainment AB, входящий в ТОП 100 крупнейших издателей, ищет кандидата на должность Junior QA (Marketing Department) в свой крупнейший центр разработки, расположенный в Харькове, где трудится молодой коллектив из более чем 200 сотрудников.

В игры компании играют более 250 миллионов пользователей по всему миру. Офисы компании расположены в Стокгольме, Сан Франциско, на Мальте, в Москве, Калининграде, Львове и Харькове.

  • Стрессоустойчивость, внимательность, исполнительность,

Желательно:

 

  • Знание английского языка,

  • Опыт ручного тестирования мобильных/десктопных приложений или сайтов.

Условия работы:

name: Junior QA Engineer
description:
Команда MEV шукає самостійного та талановитого QA Engineer'a, який має бажання розвиватись та щоденно покращувати свої вміння. Якщо ти хочеш та вмієш повністю віддаватись своїй справі, нестримно розвиватись в професійному плані - ми потрібні одне одному.

 

Необхідні навички:

  • Вміння оформлювати тестову документацію (test cases, test plans, checklist, bugreports);

  • Знання роботи клієнт-серверних додатків і роботи браузерів;

  • Розуміння процесів QA на всіх етапах розробки програмного забезпечення;

  • Знання життєвого циклу bug'а, розуміння його впливу на систему;

  • Сильні аналітичні навички;

  • Увага до деталей, та бачення продукта зі сторони споживача;

  • Досвід роботи з bug tracking системами;

  • Досвід роботи з UNIX системами;

  • Досвід роботи з SQL;

  • Знання англійської мови (intermediate та вище).

 

Великий плюс, якщо у тебе є досвід у:

  • Тестуванні мобільних додатків;

  • Тестуванні API;

  • Перфоменс (Jmeter) тестуванні;

  • Роботі з Git;

  • Роботі з засобами віртуалізації (vagrant, docker);

  • Навички автоматизованого тестування;

  • Роботі з NoSQL.

 

У нас ти зможеш:

name: QA Engineer
description:
Who we are.

 

SteelKiwi is a US outsourcing company with two development centers in two beautiful Ukrainian cities: Odessa and Vinnytsia. Our products are modern mobile and web applications. We use Python/Django stack as a core of web development and all possible front-end tools to make our products shine.

We are always looking to expand our team with people who share the same passion for delivering the best results and for resting together after the effective performance. Are you ready?

 

What do we need?

 

  • experience in testing several projects at the same time
  • experience in testing of Android and iOS mobile applications
  • experience in testing modern web applications and clear understanding of their architecture
  • knowledge and understanding of the overall testing process
  • knowledge of the Agile and Scrum development methodologies and understanding of what role QA engineers play in them
  • strong desire to grow and improve in the field of Quality Assurance
  • good grasp of the IT industry and applications testing in particular
  • solid analytical skills and good sequential thinker
  • English (Intermediate)

 

What should you do?

 

  • manual testing of web and mobile applications
  • client's requirements analysis and creation of test cases/check-lists
  • conducting test sessions
  • providing a description of located bugs and submitting them to the issue tracker
  • ability to cooperate with the development team, Project Manager and the client
  • leading demo to the customer
  • work with Postman, JIRA, Jmeter, ZAP

 

Our benefits:

 

  • talented colleagues with a good sense of humor
  • the exchange of experience
  • the feeling of the importance of what you do
  • growth prospects for this position
  • free of charge English classes; paid events attendance
  • purchase the necessary software, release-party, pizza-party
  • periodic review of the salary every six months
  • purchase a laptop or PC

 

We believe that work can be a pleasure, so we are waiting for someone who shares our views.

 

Interview stages:

 

Stage 1. Interview with HR (Skype or in person, if you want to see our office).

Stage 2. Test task (no restrictions on the implementation, but the faster you do - the faster we'll give you feedback).

Stage 3. Interview with the head of the department (Tech Lead).

And then we make a decision within 5 days (approximately).

 

If you found yourself in these lines - we are looking forward to your CV.
