name: Middle QA Engineer
description:
We are Californian IT company Rallyware based in the center of Kharkiv.

 

By joining our team, you will have the opportunity to contribute in a number of ways to our

Customer Success and Development departments and the evolution of the product itself. This role offers a wide array of potential challenges and the opportunity to dive deep into your area of interest as it pertains to our product and business.

 

Requirements:

  • 1,5 - 2 years of experience testing in an Agile environment;
  • Upper-Intermediate English (+Technical);
  • Experience with JIRA, Confluence and Zephyr to develop/execute functional and regression test scripts;
  • Being self-driven, flexible and able to work independently;
  • Knowledge of testing methodologies and the software development lifecycle;
  • Strong Communication skills.The program is very large, a well-coordinated test effort is a key to a successful release;
  • BA or BS degree;
  • Demonstrated ability to manage competing priorities in a dynamic environment;
  • Strong process, analytical and problem-solving skill;
  • Excellent interpersonal and teamwork abilities with QA and development teams.

 

We offer:

  • Flexible hours, the ability to work from home if necessary;
  • Working directly with the customer;
  • A cozy office in the city center;
  • An excellent compensation package.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Join a team of experienced professionals in the development and testing of advanced software applications;
  • Test key functionality, setup and verify data, and report test results to the manager. You may be responsible for interacting with clients on a daily basis during testing phases to ensure that release testing defects are communicated to the client and/or to support UAT;
  • Work with Business Analysts to review software design and requirements documentation to understand the application functionality;
  • Manage defects discovered during testing;
  • Maintain a strong working relationship with the development team;
  • Perform, coordinate and support UAT (User Acceptance Testing);
  • Communicate and update product/project management and development to ensure delivery timelines satisfy business needs;
  • Analyze business requirements and addresses requirements that are missing, unclear, inconsistent or may lead to potential defects within the application and/or processes;
  • Be a champion for high-quality software products and identify opportunities for improving QA strategies and results;
  • Accurately assess risk level of code changes, and calibrate the testing approach as needed;
  • Demonstrate a love for problem-solving, finding the tough bugs, and proving out applications.

 

About the project

Interesting fast-growing startup - an interactive platform for building social gamification for the enterprise.

rallyware.com

name: QA Engineer
description:
As a quality assurance engineer, you will be responsible for conducting expert reviews. You will take part in large, high-end, cutting edge web projects within an international team and will work with project managers and developers throughout the lifecycle of the project. This position demands a multitasker with great attention to detail.

Some of our clients include: Johnson & Johnson, McDonald's, Disney, Moet Hennessy (LVMH), Slate, The United Nations, The French Government, The European Union, Sony, Louis Vuitton, Publicis, and TBWA.

 

Requirements:

 

-At least 2 years of experience in web testing

-Web domain knowledge: browser and mobile compatibility, CSS/HTML, web-services

-Experience in markup (slicing) testing

-Experience with methods and technology of software testing

-Experience with creation and support user and test design documentation: test strategy, test plan, Test -Summary Report for Customer, User Guide; Its expert review

-Knowledge of specific software tools (bug management systems, test tools)

-Experience in testing different CMS platforms, preferably Drupal

-Attention to detail

-Willingness for self-improvement in software quality assurance

-At least strong Intermediate English is a must (ability to read technical literature, and interact with project managers, clients)

 

Responsibilities:

-Perform manual testing on different platforms, browsers, and emulation software

-Take part in analysis of project documentation

-Take part in the creation of detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test design documentation

-Prioritize and execute testing activities

-Take part in test analysis

-Take part in bug/change management: log defects, work with tickets, including tasks, bugs and enhancements

-Report and escalate to the QA lead on daily basis

 

We offer:

-Multinational working environment

-A dynamic, professional, and friendly team

-Competitive salary + comprehensive benefits package

-Flexible corporate culture in a fun modern facility

-Ongoing professional growth and development

-Challenging and varied global Drupal projects

-Opportunities to attend specialized conferences, trainings and seminars
